I've always played poker for money, but I guess this works too. I just hope I don't lose like I usually do...

state.text: Golden Deer Beach Trip! Woo! This is going to be great!

case.state: Garreg Mach Beach Trip! Woo! This is going to be great!
That's the name you're going by? Somebody has issues...
Are you... Trying to be my brother? Ew. Creep.
Come on, I know you're not the real Claude, you're just some wannabe. So, you know, that's what I'll call you.
Uh, no. This isn't happening. I'm the only Hilda around here. You can be... I don't know, Helga.
Ooh, very commanding. I think you and I are going to enjoy this, ~player~.
Wait, what? Like... no, you're not our Professor. Are you? What are you trying to pull here? This is just a coincidence, right?
Oh, hey, we've got the whole academy represented, even Abyss. Well, I guess it's up to me to show you why the Deer get the Gold!
I feel like there's something I'm missing here, like... you two all look so much more mature and stuff...
Really, Fina? You think there are people who wouldn't know that before arriving? Better safe than sorry, I guess...
Sure, I don't see why not. It's just a game, right?
Ooh, Petra! You look great too! That bikini's so good on you! This is going to be so much fun!
Aww, Petra! That's so sweet! You look stunning, as always.
So... a butterfly and a ball of light. This feels like it's probably going to be a weird game.
Ooh, Petra, it's so nice to see you! Oh, and I love your bikini, too! You're making me wish I'd worn my swimsuit.
Oh, Leonie, you look... different. Like, more adult. It's a good look on you.
Hey, Leonie. Guess we both had the same idea for making the most of our downtime, huh?
Not too often I see you taking some time to relax, Leonie. Maybe this'll be good for you.
Well, this is nice seeing everyone... I was more expecting to be meeting new people, but this is fun too.
Huh... so you all... totally remember I'm definitely bad at poker and bluffing and all that stuff...
Is that you, Bernadetta? You look... different. I mean, not bad, just... I didn't think you would change so much so quickly, I guess?
I'm sorry, uh... are you sure you've got the right person? I think I would remember meeting someone who looked like you, Marth, and I just... don't.
Oh, Petra! It's so nice to see you! If Edelgard's around, I'm sure that's where Claude is. You know how they like playing politics.
Ha! He wishes. No, I'm sure he's doing some complicated strategy planning thing.
A table full of pink-haired badasses and ~player~, huh? Not that I'm complaining, but it seems like someone has a type.
Bernie? I didn't pick you to be a poker player, but it's always nice to see a friendly face!
Oh, Bernie! Are you here to work on your confidence? Good for you!
Uh, Bernie... I don't think this is a seminar. This is just a game of strip poker. But it should still help you with your confidence!
"Social interaction practice"? Uh... sure, that's... kind of what this is. If the professor said you should come here, then it'll probably be fine.
Oh! Hey Professor Nevrand! Am I supposed to call you that outside of the classroom? Should I be pretending I don't know you?
Here's the deal: you don't ask me if I've been practicing my archery, I won't lie to you about how much archery practice I've done.
Oh... this is weird. I'm not used to seeing teachers at poker games. Should I go?
Are you a mercenary or a teacher right now? Because if you're a teacher, I think we should both pretend I was never here.
Oh, I love your hair, Laevatein! Maybe we could share tips after the game?
Be prepared to lose, everybody - you made the mistake of playing against me on my birthday!
Um... not that I want to say anyone's cheating, but how is that ball of light going to strip?
Um... everyone else sees the talking butterfly, right? Okay, good.
Galatea, huh... I think that's Ingrid's family's name. But she has the crest of Daphnel. There was no great hero Galatea... so who are you supposed to be?
Ooh, is somebody looking for a date? Well you're in luck, Valentine is my middle name. No, I mean it seriously is!
So Amy, you're a pink-haired fighter who specializes in two-handed weapons, huh? If I didn't know better, I might start to think ~player~ has a type.
What do you know, another Golden Deer! I didn't expect to see you here, Leonie! I guess a competition like this would be just right for you, huh?
Did Claude send you here to spy on me, Leonie? Because if he did, you're not spying very well.
Oh! Ignatz! I didn't expect to see you here. You do know the stakes of this poker game, right?
Ignatz? I didn't pick you to be into this sort of game. But, hey, always nice to have a friend, right?
Wait, what's up with this zombie stuff? I thought we were here for strip poker?
Ugh, walking over sand is the worst! Does anyone have a pegasus I could ride?
I hate walking over sand. What's the point of going to the beach if you're not in a cute swimsuit?

Why am I here? Just to suffer? Nobody here wants to see me naked!
WHAT'S THE POINT OF THIS, ~PLAYER~?! WHY WOULD YOU DO THIS TO ME?!
Nice to see some familiar faces. I don't get to see enough old friends without fighting them lately.
I was told there'd be a hot and steamy poker game, but I'm starting to think someone with Alois' sense of humor might have been the one to arrange this...
Oh, hey, you're wearing that brooch I gave you. Were you hoping to run into me again? That's really sweet.
Oh, ~rivalHouse~! You know about this place too, huh? Well, good luck - when I represent the Deer, I play to win!
Looks like we've got a proper house competition going on! Well, the Golden Deer don't back down from a challenge! Fear the deer!
Don't think that just because I'm outnumbered, I'm going to give up. Fear the deer!
~deerFriend~? I can't say I expected to see another Deer here, but I'm not complaining! How about we show these dastards why they should fear the Deer!
Looks like we've got a real contest on our hands! Two Deer versus two Eagles... and ~player~ is here too.
Pink hair all around? Wow! Look at us!
Look at us! Finally, some other people who get what a cute look pink hair is! Helps if it's your natural color, though...
Oh, wow, a table full of Golden Deer, huh? You know, if we were going to be doing this all together, we probably could have just played at the academy...
Oh, this is just weird. I mean, no offense or anything, ~churchPerson~, I'm sure you're hot when you're naked, but that's not how I think about teachers, you know?
Oh, wow, a table full of Golden Deer, huh? You know, if we were going to be doing this all together, we probably could have just played at the Garreg Mach...
All set up for a girls' night, huh? That's fine by me!
All these boys here just for me? You're not going to make me strip while all the rest of you watch, are you? I'd just hate that.
Hey there, "Oh Mighty Creator". Are you here to test some new batch of lines?
Oh hey, you're my artist, right? What're you here for? Didn't get enough of an eyeful when you were making me?
Oh, hey, ~player~. Hope you're not planning on leaving early again, like last time. I'd like to see this play out completely, you know?
I've heard this place has all sorts of crazy poker games all the time - so deal me in!
So... what're the rules for this game again?
I hope none of you mind playing against a newbie! I've only played a couple of times!
Go easy on me, okay?
I can just learn while we're playing, right?
Hilda records when a game starts, so she knows if you leave early.
I think this hand is good enough already.
I don't think this needs any changing...
Do I have to change cards, or- no? Great.
Nothing to change here!
Doesn't get better than this!
Oh, these cards are the winning hand, believe me. Fear the Deer!
No cards up my sleeve - you can already tell, I'm sure!
Hey, are you staring at my chest? No? Why not?
All set here! You know, aside from being without most of my clothes.
No cards for me! Feel free to let your eyes linger a while, though.
This one's throwing off my hand.
Almost right... I'll just change this one.
I'll just swap this one and hope to get lucky.
Uno! Oh, uh, wait. Wrong game. I still need one card, though!
Full do-over here! Is there a special word for that in poker?
...no, I don't think I can make anything out of this hand. I'll need a fully new set.
Could you swap out... um, everything, I guess?
I'll need just one little change. Thanks!
Just changing this card. You'll make sure it's a good replacement, right?
I'll just need one card. By the way, am I allowed to bribe the dealer by showing him my boobs? No? What if I do it anyway?
Oh, this hand is just completely... I'll need five new cards, please.

Talk about getting screwed, and not in the fun way! Not yet, at least.
Seriously though, new hand here.
Time for a gambit! Five new cards!
One, two... ~cards.text~ cards please!
Umm... maybe ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? I think that's right.
How many cards do you guys think I should- oh, I'm not supposed to show you my cards yet, right? Then I'll say ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
I think I need... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~?
Can you swap out these ~cards.text~? Thanks!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for me! Better not be getting distracted!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ over here!
Give me... let's say ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
All the same type and in order! That's pretty rare, right? Is that good?
Oh! They match! That's good, right?
Oh no, I'd just hate it if somebody was distracted by how much skin I'm showing...
I might not have much left to wear, but I'm not losing this round!
Whew, this should keep me safe for now.
Ha! None of you have a chance at taking me down this time!
You might as well all give up and strip a layer this round - I'm unbeatable.
You're up against my best now - don't expect me to go down easy.
I'm not going to show you, but... let's just say I'm feeling pretty confident this round.
Oh, right, bluffing! Um... "Oh no, this is such a bad hand..."
Are you sure we aren't putting money on this? I feel like we should be.
Weird, I thought card games were supposed to be tougher than this.
I don't know why people talk about making poker faces so much. It's fun to know you're doing well!
How is anyone supposed to cheat at a game of cards anyway? You can't just make up new cards and hope everyone gets fooled... Right?
Oh, I think this is supposed to be good, right?
Wow, I'm a natural at this!
Is this beginner's luck, or is poker just super easy?
Ooh, another good round for me!
Oh no, this hand is-- Oh! Never mind!
I think this is supposed to be a good hand... Well, only one way to find out, I guess.
This is my round to win! Fear the deer!
I guess this will do.
This should protect me this round...
Why did they make all those rules for what hands are special and what ones aren't? I think all of them are good!
Okay, I think I get how this is all supposed to work now. Maybe.
I wonder how the wyverns are doing back home...
Can I count my boobs as a pair? No, that's fair, it was a long shot.
If I accidentally dropped my cards, could I get a new hand again? How about if I dropped them in a sexy way?
You're really gonna make me work for this, huh?
Well, I can at least try with this hand...
Guess I'll give this a shot.
Does anyone have a guide to like, obscure secret winning hands? I just want to check these ones...
Which part of the card do I want to match again? The number? Or is it the little picture?
Can I just show somebody this hand and they can tell me if this is any good?
Ooh, you know what would be fun? Playing card-themed accessories! I bet nobody's come up with those before!

Was I supposed to be doing some sort of job around the monastery to~background.time~?
...I'm sure it's fine.
One pair... that's probably enough, right?
So... is there a way we can gang up on someone in this game? It just seems like ~leader~ has a bit too much left.
Maybe it's good we're not playing for money...
Well, I can still hope this is only second-worst...
Are you sure these are my cards? Not... you know, someone else's? Please?
So, how's everyone else feeling about their hands? Good? Nobody feeling like they're definitely going to lose?
Are you really sure I can't swap these again?
Oh come on! I can't lose another hand now!
Am I not showing off enough already?!
None of you have a chance at taking me down this time.
Maybe I should have just played it straight from the start? No, that's just ridiculous.
I can handle this. This is fine. Everything is fine.
Mmmn... That's not good...
Oh no, not now...
Does anyone want to swap hands?
Can I just sit this round out?
Which part of the card do I want to match again? The number? Or is it the little picture?
Okay, I'll just - oh, I'm not allowed to swap cards again? Damn.
You know, it's probably good I didn't try this with actual money first.
Oh, and I think it's time I let you all know - I'm actually not new to poker. I was just trying to get an advantage. Sorry!
Hey, so, minor confession - I might have been lying a little about how good I am at poker. Because I'm actually pretty good.
Now I'm down to my underwear, I guess I should confess - I actually know poker pretty well. The innocent act is just a trick Claude taught me.
Now I'm down to just my bikini, I guess I should confess - I actually know poker pretty well. The innocent act is just a trick Claude taught me.

state.text: Oh, this is weird. My only cards with numbers on them are ten and one; the rest all have those people on them, and they've all got the same little picture... do I win now?
So, I haven't played poker much. My cards all have sequential numbers, and they've all got the same little picture... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got four of the same number... that's really good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got one matching number pair and one set of three... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. My cards all have the same picture in the corner... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. My cards all have numbers one after another... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got three matching numbers here... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got two matching number pairs here... that's pretty good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. Two of my cards match... that's an okay hand, right?
So, I haven't played poker too much. None of my cards match... that's bad, right?

case.state: Bernie? Bernie! BERNIE!!! She must have fainted! I guess we... just keep playing until she wakes up?

You mean...?
You know what, yeah, I think I could see that. Assuming you'd be up for that too, Leonie.
Besides, I think that would be a great opportunity for your partner to enjoy some "alone time" with ~player~.

Caught between the affections of two handsome men; one a suave vigilante, the other a heroic agent of a secretive organization...
Sounds like the kind of story that would get a book put in the library's restricted section.
Uh... I mean, it's not a huge surprise now, after Sakura did it first.
I... um... look, so long as you don't attack me and are, you know, decently hot, I don't really care what you are, if I'm being honest.

You mean...?
You know what, yeah, I think I could see that. Assuming you'd be up for that too, Leonie.
Ignatz does all sorts of art for the Deer, but I never thought about getting him to do a nude painting of me... especially to give to someone else.
Is that a picture of... oh, she's naked there, huh?
You know, Bernie, I'd be happy to help you accessorize some time. The usual uniform is fancy enough on its own, but I think you need some sparkle for when you're out of uniform.
Honestly, offering a threesome with two hot women sounds like it should work just fine. I know it would work to get me into bed.
Oh, really? I think Senko's a much better fox than I am. I just don't know if I'm cute enough to live up to her example...
Aww, the two of you are so cute together! I'm really glad you're having a good time.
Well, tomorrow is my day off, and thankfully I don't have any "bonus lectures" scheduled, so I'm going to sleep in and avoid chores. It's going to be great.
Ugh, classes, training, all that stuff. I'd rather not think about that, honestly, it'll just spoil the fun of the game.
Hey, Bernie, you like plants and stuff, right? Do you have a favorite flower or something that someone could design a hair clip to look like?
Oh, Leonie, it's your birthday, right? Did your village send you something special?
Oh, Petra, it's your birthday, right? Have you got any presents from your family in Brigid?
Ooh, it's your birthday, right, Lysithea? Is this your way of giving yourself a little treat?
Whaaat? Come on Leonie, you know me - I'm just a delicate flower! There's nothing I can teach you about fighting!
Well... maybe there's a little bit I can show you some time, but I don't know... I just don't have much free time for sparring with all the jobs I'm being given all the time...

Oh, sure, I've seen plenty of ancestral weapons. One of the teachers at Garreg Mach uses the Sword of the Creator, and we had to fight Sylvain's brother when he tried to use the Lance of Ruin, and I use Freikugel, my family axe. They all seem kind of... weird, though. Like, creepy and bony and stuff. Laevatein seems much nicer.

Sure, a bunch of my classmates use crest weapons. Lorenz has Thyrsus, Baltie has his Vajra-Mushti, Yuri has the Fetters of Dromi... Oh, and I have Freikugel, obviously. Still, they're all weird and bony and creepy-looking. I'd like them way more if they looked like your Laevatein.
Not really. I mean, if I have weapons I'm good at, why not just stick to those and do well, instead of changing and disappointing everyone?
No, it's just hard work for me. I know how to use a spear and an axe, so what's the point in putting a sword in my hands? I'm just going to be disappointing in comparison.
Yeah, but there's motivation in a real fight. I have friends to protect, and people who need me. Training, though? Exercise, sparring, and weapon drills without any real reward? No thanks.

It's different in a real fight. If I end up sweaty and tired, it's because I protected people, and kept my friends alive. If I'm sweaty and tired at the end of training, I just feel gross. There's no reward, just endless weapon drills and exercise.

Well, I'm glad that you are. I know that I don't know you too well, really, but nobody deserves to be treated like you were. You're a full person, defined by more than your ability with a sword, no matter what anyone else tries to tell you.

I'm really happy that you are. I know we don't really know each other that well, but I still know you deserved better than you were given. You're your own person, defined by more than just your ability to kill, and I hope you remember that.

Oh, they're all too used to getting what they want just by demanding it. They don't realize that it's much more fun to find the way to make what you want come to you on its own. They need to learn that the really important things are the ones you don't say...
They're used to having whatever they want at their beck and call. It's much more fun to make the things you want come to you on their own. Really, it's all about the things you don't say.
A bodysuit, huh? There is something kinda hot about having almost everything on display without actually showing any skin... You might be onto something.

Skintight bodysuits... You know, I hadn't really thought about it, but that whole idea of showing off almost everything while having your skin fully covered seems like it could be hot. I might have to try that...

Marinette, listen to me. There are plenty of things I say that I am not serious about. Making sure people take care of themselves and having sex with hot people are two topics I will never joke about.

Marinette, there are two topics I will never joke about. The first is making sure people take care of themselves. The second is having sex with hot people. There are plenty of other things I say that I don't mean, but I am absolutely dead serious on those.
Oh! Right! That makes sense. Well, I guess it's kind of nice to think that you're just as human as I am, even if you're also a badass from space.
Oh! Right! Silly me. Well, I think that's kind of a nice thing. Even if you're a badass from space, you're still just as human as I am.
What!? That's totally cheating!
I know I didn't play the most ethically, but... come on! That can't be allowed! That's blatant cheating!
So, Pyrrha, did Beacon not have any sort of sauna or baths or anything? I mean, the way you're acting, I'd almost think you've never been naked in front of anyone before.

You know, Sucrose, I hadn't picked you to be the type to wear sexy lingerie like that, but you're actually really into this whole strip poker thing, huh? You act all quiet and shy, but you've got a secret kinky side too, right?
Huh... I've gotta way, I like your choice of lingerie, Sucrose. I think I finally get you - you act all meek and quiet and shy, but you're a lot kinkier than you let on, aren't you?
So, um... What do you want us to call you now? Are cute nicknames still okay, or do you want us to use your full name?
You're so lucky to have a weapon that you can match with a cute outfit, Aqua! Those are hard to find!
You've got a super cute outfit and a weapon that matches it? Talk about lucky. Those are crazy rare.
Well, things aren't peaceful right now, but there's no infighting in the Alliance. Everyone's united against the Empire.
I wouldn't call things peaceful right now, with the Empire declaring war on the Church of Seiros, but I can tell you that the Alliance isn't breaking down over that.

Oh, Seteth works for the Church, but he knows all sorts of weird stuff. He writes stories, too, but I bet he'd know basically everything about the history of Fódlan, especially the Church of Seiros and the Saints.

He's this weird guy from the Church who talks like he's a thousand years old, and knows all sorts of weird stuff. He'd know all about the Church stuff, which means probably the big wars too, since the Church got involved in those.

Seteth is... I guess I should leave it to him to decide whether to explain the specifics, but he's just about the best historian anyone could ask for. If you want to learn about the history of Fódlan, he's your best option.
The specifics are... complicated, but the short version is that he's the best historian in all of Fódlan. Anything historical, he'll know about it for sure.
Oh come on, it won't be that bad! It's just a little kiss! It's a fun little tradition!
It's just a little tradition Professor Casagranda was telling everyone about. Didn't you see the one she hung over the door to her office?
Wait, Seteth's been working on a book with you too, Bernie? I've been helping him write a book of fairy tales!
Wow, Seteth writes a lot, huh? There's the fables he wrote for Flayn when she was younger, and now the book about the saints.
Stern but kind, huh? Sounds kind of like Seteth too. He even has the Crest of Cichol. I wonder what Professor Hanneman would think about that...

Hmm... well, Fódlan has Derdriu. I'm a bit biased with how long I've spent there, but I honestly love it - the shops are all amazing, there's all sorts of things getting imported and exported all the time, and the beaches are perfect.
I don't know if you care about history and religious stuff, but I know a ton of people come through Garreg Mach's cathedral on holidays. It's got stained glass and all that sort of pretty stuff.
Well, I've only personally seen Derdriu, but I've heard Fhirdiad and Enbarr are just as incredible. If you have the chance, I'd say that visiting all three capitals would be worthwhile.

Oh, I've got one! Dorothea told me that one of the instructors at Garreg Mach doesn't have a pulse! I mean, she thinks it was some kind of trick, but I have no idea how they could pull something like that off.

Um... I don't know if it's really gossip, but there are some students who are convinced there's a ghost haunting the monastery dorms. Apparently there's something wandering the halls with a needle, giggling to itself. Weird, huh?

I don't know if it's really "gossip", but apparently the Flame Emperor everyone's so worked up about is barely taller than I am! It's not like it makes him less of a threat or anything, but it's kinda funny, right? The dangerous mastermind is a total manlet!
Ugh, logistics, training, all sorts of work. I'd rather not think about that, honestly, it'll just spoil the fun of the game.
Um... I don't think I can recommend anywhere in Fódlan to go sightseeing. Not nowadays, at least. Once the war's over, Derdriu might be nice to visit... assuming it's still standing...

Well... I don't know if this is actually true or something I just hope is, but apparently Her Majesty, Emperor Edelgard of the Adrestian Empire, is still totally head over heels for one of our teachers. Doesn't make her less scary, but it's kinda funny, right?

There's this Alliance General who joined up with Claude's army not too long ago called Judith. My brother's told me all kinds of stories about her. I don't know if they're true, but if Holst admires her, that's pretty impressive in itself.

There was this one rumor I heard that the Death Knight I've had to fight a couple of times is actually the brother of one of the girls from Faerghus I knew in the academy. Pretty crazy if it's true, especially since he's fighting for the Empire.

You know, I did overhear this one girl saying that Dimitri's a really bad person because he "murders women". She made a big point about it being "not just killing, but murdering". I don't care that much about Faerghus, but it sounded pretty dumb to me.
Okay, Lyralei, I've just gotta ask. Why only pierce one nipple? Like, it's a cute look and all, but did you get distracted halfway through, or...?
Sorry if this is a question you get all the time, but... why only get one pierced? I mean, I like the look, but everyone I know goes all or nothing, you know?
I might not pay too much attention in history class, but even I know that without the War of Heroes, Fódlan would be totally different from how it is today.
I'm not great at history, but the War of Heroes was what formed the Ten Elites into the noble houses of Fódlan, including my ancestor Goneril, so... I'm going to say that, definitely.

History's not my best subject, but the War of the Eagle and Lion formed Faerghus, and the Crescent Moon War after that formed the Leicester Alliance. Without those, we'd still all be part of the Empire. That seems pretty major to me.
I don't know about admire, but I'm descended from Goneril, one of the Ten Elites - I even bear his crest. That's a pretty good connection.
He's not really historical yet, but Holst will definitely get into the history books one day. He's the head of our noble house and an amazing general - does that count?
I don't know anything like that myself, but if you ever meet someone called Seteth, you should definitely ask him.
Oh, I know events and stuff, but the actual stories... not so much. If you ever meet Seteth though, I bet he could tell you all sorts of stories about Fódlan's history.
What? Come on, Petra. Do you really think I'm against being indulgent? If anything, that just made me want to visit Brigid myself.

What? Petra, do you really think anyone here saw that and thought "Wow, I'd sure hate to go to the place where that crazy-hot woman with the beautiful tattoos and the incredible body came from"? If anything, that just made me want to visit Brigid myself.

Not at all - I have an older brother, Holst, and he totally smothers me. Part of why I enrolled in Garreg Mach in the first place was to get away from having him looking over my shoulder all the time...
Ugh, no - my brother Holst is this famous general. If I didn't have him though, I'd have to be in charge of House Goneril, so I guess it's not all bad.
No, Bernie, you weren't a bad girl at all. You followed all the rules, did exactly what you were told... you were such a good girl.
Ha! You should have seen your face! That was hilarious! Come on, I knew exactly what you meant - just be more careful when you say the words out loud next time, okay?
Ooh, now that's an offer I don't hear much, and I could do with something nice to hang in my room. Sure, I'd love for you to do my portrait.
Ooh, I've been looking for something to send back home to Holst to show him I'm doing fine. You can do something like that, right?
Ohh! So it's designed for channeling magic? I've seen Marianne do that with a regular sword and it totally wrecked it. Having a special sword just for that seems smart.
I'm totally going to have to talk to Constance about figuring out some kind of futa spell when I get back to the monastery. That sounds like weird enough magic to be her style.
Oh, don't worry about that! Just work with what you've got! And for the record, I think small and cute is a good look.

Right, we can just keep playing while you look, right Ignatz?
That was a rhetorical question, let's keep going!
Wait... does ~leader~ have as much of a lead as I think? How did that happen?
~leader~ has to be cheating, right? This is crazy!
Hey, Leonie, you remember how I said I'd seen you play poker before? I meant it. I know all your tells. I've already won this game. So, you know, good luck!
You'll get plenty of good, long looks in, don't worry. Whatever you want to do with my ass, though, that's going to have to wait till later.
Don't worry, they're on full display. You'll get plenty of good looks in. Anything you want my ass for, though - kicking, spanking, or whatever else - you're going to have to wait.
Sounds like it's been hard. Maybe together, we can deal with some of those pent-up feelings...
Sounds like the last while must have felt long and hard. Don't worry, I'm sure I can help with some of those pent-up feelings...

Hm... This flirting's been fun, so the idea of a classified file all for myself seems pretty tempting... You've made a strong case, but I'll have to see you in a real combat scenario to properly decide, I think. You've got to go all out to impress me.

You're definitely fun to flirt with, so an ongoing file seems tempting... But I'm not going to make a final decision until I see you show me what you can really do. Show me you can follow through on your promises, you know?
Well, I like to think of competition as one of the most fun ways to be shared. I think I'd have to see you try both before I could pick a favorite. You wouldn't mind that too much, would you?

You even threw a hand for me, Noire, which was way more than you had to do.
If it helps at all, I feel super bad about it now. If there's something I can do to help make it up to you, just say the word, okay?

~player~ even threw a hand for me, which was way more than ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ had to do.
If it helps at all, I feel super bad about it now. If there's something I can do to help make it up to you, just say the word, okay?
Look, Toph, I didn't know I was going to be playing with a human lie detector, okay? So I doubled down and hoped you weren't actually that good! It's the sunk cost fallacy!
Well, I'll never turn down a compliment... but if you're looking for suggestions, I think my boobs are looking especially good today.
All compliments are good compliments, really, but if you're looking for inspiration... well, when I checked this morning, my ass was looking pretty great.
I... It's for... It's complicated, okay? It's a complicated strategy, and I'm done with it now.
But if I pretend to be bad, then you won't think I'm a threat, and I can... ugh, forget it, it's over now.
If it helps at all, I feel super bad about it now. I can't change the past or anything, but... if there's something I can do to make it up to you, just let me know.
Very eager to please, aren't you? I might just have to take you up on that offer...
Well, I can't speak for anyone else, but the promise of good food and hot sex works pretty well on me. No reason it has to be complicated, you know?

I've never had too hard a time of it. Just find a guy who thinks you're hot - that shouldn't be any sort of challenge for you - and offer him food or just straight-up sex. Oh, it helps if you show off some cleavage too, but you've clearly got that figured out.
Ooh... Mitama totally has the right idea. If I wasn't still playing, I'd totally join in.
Ooh... Mitama totally has the right idea. If I didn't want to watch my reward for winning, I'd totally join in.
What? No, it's... it makes sense. It's a good strategy. It's psychological warfare.

Yeah, and that's why we have a head of the Alliance. We were in a succession crisis before Claude showed up, and even if he hadn't, we were resolving it peacefully. We've learned from history. There won't be war again in Fódlan for a long time.

Yeah, and the Alliance formed democratically to avoid that. We choose a lead house, and each house has their own successors. We have a council to avoid future wars, and working together, we're going to keep Fódlan peaceful for centuries to come.

condition.saying: Alright, I've been thinking, and I've settled on my mercenary title. Ready? ... The Blade Breaker II. What do you all think?

case.state: Blade Breaker II, huh? After the original Blade Breaker, Jeralt. It's... honestly not bad. I think it suits you. If anyone's earned it, I'd say it was you.

condition.saying: I want to be a top-tier mercenary, like Captain Jeralt the Blade Breaker. For my title, Caspar suggested... The Raging Bear. Well?

case.state: The Raging Bear... you know, I like it. Adds a good element of surprise that Claude will like too. I mean, who expects to be shot by an arrow from a bear?

condition.saying: If I want to be as good as the Blade Breaker, I need my own tough-sounding title. I was thinking... The Executioner. Well?

case.state: Executioner!? Talk about dark! I mean, I guess I can kind of see it, but don't you want to be more a defender of the innocent than a ransacker of towns?
So, Senko, I know I was lying about being a beginner at poker, but I want you to know that I honestly would love a pampering from you. It sounds like an amazing time, really.
Hey, Leonie, if I became a mercenary, what sort of name do you think would fit me? Maybe... The Steel Saint? The Heartstringer? Ooh, The Pink Dragon?

Well, I can try. I'm not big on history, but Goneril and the other Elites were these champions of the Goddess who worked with Nemesis, The King of Liberation, to save all of Fódlan... at least until they got too greedy and arrogant and turned on each other.

I don't know my history too well, but they were like these big heroes who saved Fódlan, only they got too arrogant and greedy and Saint Seiros had to kill them. Still, they're the ancestors of like... all the noble houses.

Well, he's the Duke of Goneril, so he's constantly defending Fódlan's Locket, which is this big important fort, and he has all this knowledge of tactics, so he lays out these plans, then he charges in and leads everyone to victory. He's kind of amazing.

Even if you ignore all the military stuff he does, he's super smart and charming and works so hard to keep everyone happy and healthy as one of the Alliance's Five Great Lords. Honestly, we all thought he was going be the next head of the Lords before Claude showed up.

Anyway, so Saint Seiros got the other four Saints and the Church and the Empire all together, which was a big deal because the Empire was just starting to get going at that point, and they fought until Seiros killed Nemesis, and all the Ten Elites surrendered.

The War of Heroes was this whole big thing like a thousand years ago. There was this king, Nemesis, and his followers, the Ten Elites, and they used to be heroes, but they got greedy and started fighting with each other to take over all of Fódlan.

Oh, right, I should finish that story.
So, the Elites weren't allowed to live, but they were once heroes, so their families became the noble houses, and the Church handed all the land to the Empire to rule, and that created peace in Fódlan.

Fifty years after Faerghus split off, the Leicester region tried to leave the Empire the same way, and the Empire couldn't stop them, but then the Kingdom invaded them, and made Leicester part of Faerghus.

So this started like five hundred years ago, when Loog of House Blaiddyd decided he didn't like the Empire, so he got a bunch of other nobles together and rebelled, but the Empire didn't like that, so the War of the Eagle and Lion started.

There's this big thing where everyone got together in the Tailtean plains and fought, and Loog won, so the Church stepped in and let them take Faerghus as a Holy Kingdom, with Loog as the king, and Garreg Mach holds mock battles there now because of that.

So a couple of kings come and go, until one king had three sons but he didn't name any of them his heir, so they split up Faerghus into thirds, one of which was Leicester. When the son who was ruling that third died, that's when the Crescent Moon War started.

So there's a bunch of fighting and backstabbing and stuff, until Faerghus just agrees to let Leicester split off, and that made the Leicester Alliance, which is where Goneril is. Instead of a single ruler, we have the Five Great Lords, and they work together to rule.

Well, yeah, I guess. But Holst earned his reputation as a warrior and a leader himself - I think that his actual work reserves him a spot in history at least as important as where Dimitri and Edelgard got to just by being born.

Well, Holst was going to lead the Alliance, but with Claude to succeed the Riegan line, that's not likely any more. I don't want Claude gone though, because he's one of my best friends. I just want them both to be remembered, I guess.

Hm... Well, this place seems like it gets people from all sorts of places, but... I mean, I can't imagine Seteth having fun with anything, especially not strip poker. So I guess just hope you can find your way to Garreg Mach some day?
Well, there's absolutely no way he'd ever show up to play strip poker, so probably not here... I guess you just have to try to get to Garreg Mach if you want to meet him.

Um... not really. The stories say how the Goddess gave him Freikugel and the power of the Crest that marks our family line, and he helped Nemesis protect Fódlan from the dark northern gods. They don't say why the Elites were chosen or anything.

No, I guess not. All the stories I know are about how the Goddess chose Nemesis and the Elites as champions, gave them Crests and the Heroes Relics, and then they saved Fódlan from the northern gods. None of the Ten Elites have their own stories.

Well, the war was a thousand years ago now, and everyone knows that when the Elites succumbed to corruption, the people rose up and killed them. Honestly, I think nobody really cares about it so long as they get treated well, and I'm fine with that.

Well, all of the noble houses are in the same position, so the fall of the Elites is more a reminder to not allow ourselves to get corrupt than anything else. Besides, that's all a thousand years in the past now. Who can hold a grudge for that long?

Sure, maybe, but I'm fine not knowing. It doesn't make any difference to me, after all. Whatever he did, I'm sure it was impressive at the time, but if the stories haven't lasted, then it can't have been that great.

I guess, but I'm not gonna be the one to look into it. Whatever he did, I'm sure it was really impressive at the time, but knowing that the story got lost along the way, it can't have been that incredible.

It's not that much more serious than fooling around with another girl. I mean, sure, you're probably going to need to use a spell or herb afterwards to make sure you don't end up pregnant, but even I'm not lazy enough to not manage that.

Okay, first of all, it's called a dick - or a cock, or if you're feeling clinical, a penis - and they're not that scary. So long as you don't somehow forget to make sure you don't get pregnant, it's just as easy and fun as being with a girl.

Ah, not enough gold? I get it, things can get pretty pricey at the nice stores. The beaches are free, though, and they're usually pretty clear, so long as you don't go on the weekend or after the schools let out.
Ah, I get it, there's only so far a wallet can stretch. The beaches are usually pretty quiet, though, if you go while the kids are in classes.
Well, I'm sure they wouldn't mind the visit, so long as you don't try to take anything, and don't actively disrespect the Goddess while you're in there. You don't even have to believe in any of it.
Sure, I'm sure they wouldn't mind you taking a look around. You don't even have to be religious, so long as you don't steal anything or actively say something rude about the Goddess.

Well, there's plenty of nations, if that's what you mean. Those were just the capitals of the three in Fódlan - there's Brigid, Dagda, Duscur, Almyra... I don't know their capitals, but I'm sure they'd be interesting to visit too, even if they're not as nice.

You mean you don't have other nations on Mejare? I guess that's what happens when you can travel from planet to planet... But yeah, we have lots of other nations. The Leicester Alliance, Kingdom of Faerghus, and Adrestian Empire are just the biggest and most advanced.
Ooh, that poem is so pretty! I don't know if I really understand it, though. Aren't poems supposed to rhyme?
Ooh, that's so nice! Still breaths on still waters... I don't know if my eyes are really that cunning, though. I'm not a schemer like Claude or Yuri.
Ooh, I love that! That poem is so me.
You really want to make sure we've seen your tattoos, huh, Petra? Not that I'm complaining...
Showing off your tattoos again, Petra? You really want to make sure we get a good look, huh?

That's... not something I've had people ask about directly before. It's a bit weird to say it out loud, but... I really love it when people show their care for me by doing work that I don't want to do.
Mobile fortress destroyer? I don't know what that is, but I've fought off some pretty nasty Demonic Beasts. Some of those are big enough to eat people in a single bite!
Oh Bernie, you don't have to do that! Nobody here is planning to take advantage of you!
Wait, hold on. Marianne talks to Dorte all the time, and she never speaks back. Are you sure you know what a horse is?
Oh, the White Heron Cup! That was so much fun! I was chosen as the dancer for the Golden Deer.
I don't know about talking, but there were those big ones that we had to fight down in Abyss... oh, but you weren't there for that, Bernie, so there's no way you'd have known about them.

Really, Leonie? I already know your answer to that question, and it's "being Jeralt."
I'm kidding, I'm kidding! Mostly.

It's worth it for getting to wear cute swimsuits and see other hot people in swimsuits too. The sand has a way of getting in uncomfortable spots though, and it's hard to walk over... there's good and bad, I guess.
Well, I mean, I've played a couple of times, but you know, just for fun, nothing serious. You know I could never play as well as someone like Claude.
Who, me? My poker face is terrible, Leonie, you should know that. This is all just good luck, that's all.
Oh? Would you prefer I was drooling over you instead, Leonie? Don't worry, I have plenty of attention to go around.
Nice to meet you, Asuna - you can call me Hilda. I don't think you need to be so formal here, though.
Oh, sure! Do you have an idea of what you want? I see you've already got a good brooch, so... maybe a hair clip or necklace?
Shocked that what? Is this some sort of future thing you know about? That dastard doesn't manage to actually kill the professor, does he!?

Being famous sounds like a whole lot of hard work. That's why I'm so glad Holst is older than I am - if not for that, I'd be supposed to run House Goneril and be on the Council for the Alliance, and... ugh, it would be awful.
I don't know... I guess any jokes with people dying in them seem less funny nowadays. Even if they're usually only bandits, I've had too much of that in reality.

Oh, you know, mostly just to brush up on my poker skills. I'm not very good, so this seemed like a good place to practice, since money isn't on the line. Plus, I'll hopefully get to see some hot people naked.
Well, you know, when you... hang out and stuff. Have fun together. I don't think it needs to be super formally defined or anything.
Who, me? I have no idea what you're talking about, Senko. I'm just trying to get comfortable.
Do you really think I'd do something so underhanded as try to distract people with my cleavage to try to get an advantage, Senko? Do I seem like a scheming mastermind to you?
Mostly just bandits, but... yes, I've killed before. It's something I try not to think about too much, so thanks for that, Revy.
Oh, sure - I've got plenty of experience with... hm. Well, I don't know about dating too well, that's more Dorothea's area of expertise, but I know plenty about sex, if that would help.
Yes! Right there, just-- you've got them!

Of course! Holst sent me this amazing custom-made necklace from my favorite shop in Derdriu, Claude gave me this Almyran scarf thing, and I gave myself the best gift of all - the day off from training.

Of course! Holst and Claude gave me some amazing new accessories I'm going to have to build some outfits around, and I'm going to have tea with the Professor later - I heard they were tracking down some Albinean berry blend just for the occasion.
Oh, darn! I should have had an accessory for you made to give to you today, Leonie! You can't turn down a present on your birthday!
You know, I heard the Professor and Claude talking about trying to track down some Four-Spice Blend tea the other day. I wonder if that's got anything to do with how much you like it...
Come on, you'll be fine. I've seen you shoot that bow of yours, there's no way you're going to fail. Just relax!
So long as you can pretend like you know what you're doing, you'll be fine. Certifications are easy!

Whaaat? No way, if the Goddess didn't want you doing this, she wouldn't have allowed you to come here. I think the Goddess wants people to enjoy the world she made, not worry about doing the wrong thing all the time.

I'm sure the Goddess is fine with it - I mean, what was the point of making so many people so hot if you're not supposed to think about how hot they are? Even the Archbishop and Seteth look great. I think the Goddess made us to enjoy the world, not be worried about being wrong all the time.
Wait, really? So, what, you just felt guilty every time you did it? That sounds like it would take all the fun out of masturbating.
I mean, the Church likes to pretend everything is all holy and stuff, but I bet even the Saints liked to get off sometimes. There's no way it's actually a sin.

What? No, never.
{small}Not out loud, at least.
Well... I can maybe see where they got the idea. You do choose to be around people who are loud and aggressive a lot, so if someone didn't know better, they might assume it's because... you know.

No, no, of course not.
But, you know, if you did, hypothetically, I wouldn't judge you. Unless you wanted to be judged, I guess.

Look, I'm sure the Goddess has better things to worry about than people touching their bits to make themselves feel good. None of us have been smote-- smited? Whatever-- yet. She doesn't care, just do what feels good.

Do you really think the Goddess Herself would care if we touch ourselves a little bit now and again? She's got souls to deal with and evil to hold back and prayers to listen to, we can get off and she won't notice.
Oh, you know it! You and me together, I bet we could get so wasted.
Who, me? No, I'm just getting lucky card draws, that's all.
It's weird, right? Maybe I'm a natural at poker or something. I'm not about to complain about it!
Ha... yeah. I mean, for a total newbie like me, it seems like I should lose pretty quickly, huh? But that just... doesn't seem to be happening.
Well, sure. I might have a trick or two up my sleeve still. Uh, metaphorically, I mean.
Aww, Petra, that's so sweet. I mean, I like to think I have the cuteness of a fox too, but I'll settle for just the cunning.

Punishment? Well, if you have a blindfold, some rope, maybe a low powered chill spell...
Wait, you wanted the ones we dislike? Never mind.
Punishment, huh? Well, I guess the obvious one for me is exercise... but you wouldn't be so cruel as to subject a delicate flower like myself to those horrors, would you?
I'm sure nobody would be so rude that they'd make fun of the way you talk, Petra. Honestly, I think you speak better than some of the soldiers back home.
Well, as a loyal daughter of the Leicester Alliance and member of the Golden Deer, I've got to go with the obvious pick. I know it's predictable, but have you seen a deer in person? They're amazing!

Well, okay, the obvious answer for me is deer, but I really like wyverns too. They're crazy strong and they fly around with people on their backs like it's nothing. So much better than marching all over the place.
Pfft. My dad got my tutor to explain everything in the most boring way possible. All the actually fun parts I heard about from spending time around Baltie and the older noble kids.

All the boring stuff I got taught by my tutor. The fun parts I learned about from the kids of other nobles telling stories at parties. Well, hearing it from them and testing it out for myself once I was old enough.
Huh, yeah, I guess it is kinda long. What about just Kuma? Or Kumie? Oh, or KT?
I'm probably not the person to ask, since I've never had a nickname myself. Just cursed with a name that's too easy to say, you know?
Can I pick a banquet or something? How do you expect me to choose just one dish when there's so much good food out there?
Well... if I have to pick just one, it's hard to beat a fresh peach sorbet, especially after a big, heavy meal.
Ooh, a poem about me? Sure, that sounds like fun!
You write poems? Well, it would be rude of me to turn down such a kind offer. I'd love to hear it.
I mean... do Crest Stones count? They look like gems, and they're definitely magic, but unless you're trying to transform yourself into a horrible monster, they're not much good without a Crest.
I guess the Crest Stones in the Holy Tomb are gem-like, and they're definitely unusual, but they're not much good without a Crest, unless you're trying to turn yourself into a monster.
Thank you, Miku! Yours are super cute too! And so long! Do they get in your way at all?
Aww, thank you, Miku! I love yours, too! They're so long, though! Don't they get in the way when you're doing things?

Oh, sure. Claude's the leader of the Golden Deer House, and the heir of Duke Riegan, so he's set to inherit leadership of the Leicester Alliance. He's all charming and charismatic, but he's always got all sorts of plans for whenever things go wrong, and the way he smiles, it's always like he knows a secret you don't.

Oh, sure. We haven't even known each other for that long, but Claude's my best friend. He always acts so smooth and charming, but whenever anything goes wrong, he knows exactly how to fix it. He always seems like he's two steps ahead, no matter what you're doing.
Yeah? I like looking nice. I don't think you're one to go around judging appearances with that dumb hat on.
What, I'm not allowed to look my best? If there's anyone who should be judged for their fashion choices, it's not me. I'm not the one in the dumb hat.
Oh, yeah, the "fear the deer" thing is something our class leader, Claude, started. It's just a fun way to be part of the group, you know?

Something I'd change about my body? Hm...
No, I'm coming up empty. I look great already.
Ooh, yeah, Ignatz is a painter, and I do a bit of jewelry-crafting. Do we have another artisan at the table?
You know, Petra, I think you're showing off a bit more than just your tattoo when you turn around... Not that I mind the view...
I'm always a big fan of seeing that side of you, Petra. Oh, and seeing the tattoo is nice too.
Mmnf... I know you want us to appreciate that tattoo, Petra, but there are other parts of this view that are just more distracting.

A gimmick? What, like you're gonna make some big reveal at some later point in the game? Sounds like something only a bad writer would make their character do.
Anyway, I don't know how to play poker.

Dungeons, huh... Well, there was Conand Tower. We were sent to get back the Lance of Ruin after Sylvain's brother stole it from his family, but he hired a bunch of bandits and holed up in a tower, and got turned into a demonic beast because he didn't have his family's crest. It was pretty messed up. We weren't underground, but I think that counts, right?

Hm... Well, I think that weird maze under the Monastery counts. We discovered it when the Archbishop's assistant's daughter got kidnapped, and we had to go down there and use these teleporter things to rescue her from some creepy "Death Knight" guy.

It kinda depends on how you classify a "dungeon", but there was this whole string of secret underground missions when we discovered Abyss under the monastery. There was an arena, and giant unkillable statues we had to run from... Oh, and we met the Ashen Wolves, which was cool.
I don't know if it's really "journaling", but I write down most of my thoughts in the letters I send my brother. Does that count?
I've always been a fan of beach dates. You and the guy both get to show off how good you look without so many clothes in the way, and it's super relaxing, too.
Horoscopes are those things with the star signs, right? We don't really have those in Fódlan. I mean, we've got fortune tellers, but that's not really the same thing, is it?
...Okay, this is probably going to come totally out of nowhere for you, but have you tried armor? It doesn't look good on everyone, but I think you could totally rock some pieces of leather.
Well, I do get plenty of compliments on how I look, but sometimes it'd be nice to get some about the accessories I make, or how much thought I put into making people feel good about themselves.
Hmm... No, not really. One of the perks of being the only daughter of a major noble house, I guess.

Is that a thing? I don't think I've heard of that. The closest thing we have to blood types in Fódlan is probably Crests, but that's less of a personality thing and more of a magic bloodline thing, I think...

Well, you already know that I make jewelry and other accessories, right? There's a bit of sewing and goldsmithing in that, if that counts.
Although I'm also good with my hands in those other ways too.
You've probably heard plenty of stories about how good I am with my hands in those "other ways", but I've learned a bit of sewing and goldsmithing from making accessories, if that counts.
Oh, there was a weird door in the back of a shop in Abyss, under Garreg Mach. Super weird.
Ooh... Mitama totally has the right idea. I wish I brought something soft to sleep on...
You guys had better watch out, you know? Leonie really knows how to play poker, like really competitively. I've seen her, it was crazy.
Is anyone else feeling like it's getting kind of crowded in here? Should we have picked somewhere else to play if you guys were going to be inviting extra people in?
Should we move the game somewhere with a bit more space? There's kind of a lot of us all crammed in close together...
Wow, I wasn't expecting to have so many people showing up. Did you all know that when you picked to play out here? Good call.
Geez, good thing we're outside, huh? Trying to play with this many people all in the one room would be pretty cramped.
Look at us! Talk about school spirit! Who knew there were going to be so many students here?
We might all be in uniform, but I've gotta say, this is way better than regular class.
Oh, actually, I couldn't even use my hair ties as a layer even if I was that masochistic! I've already taken off eight layers, and that's all we're allowed, right? So the ties stay.
Oh, actually, I couldn't use any extra layers even if I was that masochistic! I've already taken off eight layers, and that's all we're allowed, right? So the hair band and earrings stay.
Ugh, I'm going to have to re-tie that after the game. Winning had better be worth it...
It's so weird to have the smallest boobs in the room. Is this how other people feel around me?
You know, ~companionOpponent~, you could have asked for us to wait to start and dealt your friend in too. We've got space at the table.
Hey, ~companionOpponent~, we have a free spot at the table. Your friend could join in if you want.
So... does nobody want to see me touch myself, or...?
Come on, I am one loss away from having to forfeit. Do you guys think I'm not pretty or something?
...You know, I didn't realize quite how low-cut this thong was until now. Oh well. None of you mind a little preview of what's underneath, right?
You've got this, Bernadetta! Just imagine everyone in their underwear!
