Well, you're still pretty much a tactician, aren't you? You command fighters to make combat choices, it's just that your fighters are Pokémon, not people.

I've got plenty of power for anything I want to do. Holst gets way more power, sure, but that comes saddled with all sorts of responsibilities, too. I'd feel sorry for him, if he didn't actually love dealing with all that political stuff.

Power's overrated. Having a ton of power means you get a ton of responsibilities too, and I'm much happier leaving all of those to Holst. I get plenty of power by association, and he gets to do all his politics without me in his way.

What? No, Claude wouldn't... no, he totally would, ugh.
Fine, you might have a point. I am so going to get him back for this.

...you know what, Lucina, you might be right. I should have known he'd try to get back at me after that thing with his training bow.
Well, this means war.
Well, I mean, it's not like axes are those are that heavy, Lucina. I'm sure you're overestimating me.
Whaaat? Maybe that's just... a different me or something. I'm not a fighter, really.
Well, that's very kind, Fate. I mean, if I get my way, I'll be keeping my clothes on and not showing off too much, but that's not off to a great start, huh?
Oh, no, not at all! I'm sorry, I just don't know the etiquette for strip poker yet. I'll just... get this belt off now...
Oh, well... I guess so, yeah. They probably get used to getting a lot of... wet stuff... on the ~background.surface~ and cards and stuff...
Well, I'm not going to charge into battle naked, even if my ass is great, so making sure I look good fully-clothed is the next best thing. Makes sense to me.
I might look super hot when I'm posing nude with an axe, but I'm not doing that on the battlefield - and if I'm not naked, I have to make sure I look good clothed. Seems simple to me.
No, really, I hate training, with all those weapon drills and sparring matches and getting all sweaty... ugh. It's the worst.
Absolutely not. Training is the worst - the only part I like about it is taking a rest in the sauna afterwards. The rest of it I'd happily abandon completely.
Actually... I do have to take something off now. Why not show off a bit? Thanks for the idea, Sucrose!
Wait... If I have to strip, I guess I could do that, huh? Great idea, Sucrose!

Aww, that's so sweet of you, Sucrose. I mean, sure, there are plenty of people I could totally do this with at Garreg Mach, but... there's something kind of special about this place, you know? Besides, not coming here would mean not seeing cute pieces of ass like you.

I guess you've got me figured out, huh? Sure, the list of people who'd love to see me strip is probably a mile long, but doing it here is more fun. You get to know new people, and best of all, it's more intimate. Do you like being intimately close with me, Sucrose?
Oh, cute and practical is such a good style. I do a lot of that, but I like to throw in just a little bit of sexy too, you know?
Wait, like, actually doing cleaning and stuff? Eww, no. Getting to wear a cute outfit isn't enough to make me want to do work.

I mean, I might be a noble, but it's my brother who's actually the head of the house and stuff. He gets saddled with all the responsibility, and I get to be the fun socialite party girl who constantly has rumors circulating about her sexual antics.
No, no, it's not like that. Other people like doing things for me, because it makes them feel good about helping, and I like not having to work. That doesn't make me lazy, just efficient.
No, no, it's not like that. Other people just offer to do nice things for me, and turning them all down would be rude. That doesn't make me lazy, just nice.
Ooh... you know, that's a tempting idea. I bet there's plenty of fun the two of us could get up to, especially with a little extra company...
I-- No! Ew! I'm not like that, and neither is Holst! We're close, but not like that!
...what? No! I like things being easy, but I don't want to make other people suffer to get it, especially my friends! I want everyone to have a good life!
Oh, well, I'm sure you know already. But for the benefit of your fans... It's warm, and wet, and messy, but so satisfying, too.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I have people watching basically everything I do all day anyway and praising me for it, so I could totally manage that.
Oh, you're even smarter than you look, huh? Got it in one. I chose these socks for their very specific length, so I always show off just a little bit of thigh. Hard to ignore, right?
Ooh, I knew you were smart, but you're observant too, huh? Yeah, I chose these socks because they were just a little bit shorter than my skirt. That little bit of skin really draws the eye, right?

I know enough policy stuff to say that living in the Alliance is better than the Adrestian Empire or Kingdom of Faerghus. I trust Claude and my brother implicitly. Besides, the Officer's Academy is neutral ground, so they don't preach politics, just combat.

My brother and one of my best friends are the two most influential people in the Alliance. I trust them enough to not worry about the specifics - I know they're good people. And the Officer's Academy doesn't do politics, either - they only teach combat.

state.text: Maybe, but how many of those nobles were the sister of Holst Goneril, greatest general of the Leicester Alliance? And how many of them attended military academies where they could only get out of training some days?
Well, that sounds like selection bias to me. If they're sitting around and taking court instead of leading an army, they're obviously going to be the ones who can't fight.

case.state: I mean, he doesn't know I'm here, playing strip poker, but he knows I'm at Garreg Mach, sure. We send letters all the time.
He knows I'm at Garreg Mach, sure - we keep in touch via letters. I don't think he really needs to know about this place, though.
What? What tropes? What's a support conversation? And what about the school houses? What are you even talking about, Aaravi?
I... Tropes? Support conversations? The only thing that made any sense was that you were talking about the school houses, and even then, I don't know what you were trying to say about them.
Yeah, that's exactly what I was thinking. I mean, I don't want to be throwing gold away while I'm still learning, right? Is that why you came here too?

Right! I've still got plenty of mistakes left to make, and I don't want to be losing gold just because I don't know what I'm doing yet. Better to learn the cheap way. Is that why you came to a place like this too?
Terrain advantage... yeah, that makes sense. That was how the professor got us away from those big golem things in Abyss, so it would probably work on all sorts of other big nasties too.
That makes sense, I think. The professor's always going on about using trees for cover and not getting ambushed and stuff in regular fights, so I guess that works for monsters too.

I'd love if I could do it like that, but apparently every officer has to be on the front lines leading troops, no matter how good you are at tactics and stuff. Something to do with "knowing the human cost of war", ugh.

I wish it worked like that, but no, we're supposed to always be on the front lines no matter what. They say it's supposed to teach us about "every life being important" and "not forgetting that every soldier is human too". I still think it's rude.

It's like... it's really big and heavy and weirdly spiky, and looks kinda like it's made of old bones, but it pulses just a little sometimes, almost like it's alive. It's... not really my style, aside from the gem bit in the middle. It's a really good axe, though.

It's... um... not really like any other axe. Like, the head is huge and all made of bone, with a magic gem in the middle. It weirds me out a bit, honestly, and it clashes with most outfits pretty badly. I mean, it hits really hard, but it doesn't fit my style, you know?
Oh? So you and ~player~ must be pretty close by now, huh? I mean, I'd expect just once to be intimate enough, but it's been plenty more than that for you two, huh?
Oh? Sounds like you and ~player~ must be pretty close. I mean, getting off in front of someone is intimate enough the first time, but it's been more than that for you two, right?
Right. So I play some games here, get the rules all worked out, and I can really wow them when I play poker with them. Good plan, right? Is that what you're doing too?
Exactly. Once I've got things under control here and I know all the hands and everything, I can really wow the others when I play with them. Great plan, right? Is that why you're learning here too?
Sure, those aren't too hard. Do you know what kind of design you'd like? I could make a little book pendant or something to hang from it.
Sure, one of those shouldn't be too tough. What about the design? Maybe a little book-shaped pendant or something?
It's not very polite to imply someone's a liar like that, Shamir... but good luck to you, too. You'll need it less than I will.
I don't think it's very polite to so openly imply someone's a liar, Shamir... but good luck to you all the same. You won't need it as much as I will.
Oh, I definitely don't plan to spend much time on the front lines once I'm done with training. It's just been a good way to get my brother off my back for a bit, really.

Well, it's not like I have any sort of passion for military life. It's just a good way for me to get my brother off my back. Once I'm done training, I'm going to avoid the front lines as much as possible.

Hmm... I don't think so. A guy has a dick - or... what did you call them? Rods? - and you rub it enough, and he's going to cum.
Oh, but they do have a thing that keeps them from cumming too soon after the last time, which seems like it must suck.

Not really... I mean, guys have dicks - or... tubes, if that's what you like to call them - and you rub it, and they cum. Pretty simple.
Oh, but they do have this thing called a refractory period, which means they can't cum too soon after the last time they did. That seems like it must suck.

Huh. Well, that's disappointing, but I guess it makes sense. It's not like being generally selfish is unique to men, so women can be sexually selfish too. I've only experienced it myself with guys, though.
Huh. That sucks. Makes sense, though - men and women can both be selfish, sexually or not. I've only personally experienced it with guys, though.
Hm... Okay, I think that makes sense. I can give it a go and hope that works, at least!
Okay, so if I've got... Hm. Well, it's not like I could do worse. I can give that a shot, at least.

Well, maybe guys like thinking they're in control, so they're easier to manipulate if they think you're dumb. Maybe it's not just guys who are like that.
Or maybe I'm just as dumb as I seem. Who knows?

Well, maybe it's something like men being more likely to do things for girls they think they can get to sleep with them, and they think dumb girls are their best bets. Maybe it's not even only men who underestimate people who seem dumb.
Or maybe you're overthinking this. Who knows?
Wait, seriously? No stores at all? So people just... make stuff and give it to the bazaar in case anyone might want it? Weird...
...What? How does that even work? People make things, give them to the bazaar, and hope that somebody wants them? I don't get that at all...

Who cares if it's against some rule? You're an officer, but you have needs too. Just screw a subordinate. Knowing you're not supposed to just makes it hotter. If I couldn't be in charge of someone I'd slept with, I'd have to have changed out my entire battalion, like... three or four times over. It doesn't have to be a big deal.

If you're into a subordinate, and she's into you, just sleep with her. Forget about the rules. Training's tough, and sex is a fun way to unwind. I've used it to better get to know some of the members of my battalions plenty of times before - it doesn't have to be a big deal.
Caggy sounds like just the right choice, then. Short and sweet, just like you!
Great, Caggy it is! A nickname as short and sweet as you are.

It's not like I make people do things they don't want to, though. They're the ones offering to help me out, after all. They get a morale boost from their good deed, and my work gets done. I don't see any need for scolding there.

It's not like I'm forcing anything on them, though - I'm just accepting their kind offers of help. My work gets done and they feel good about helping someone in need. That doesn't sound scolding-worthy to me.

Exactly! They get to swoop in and be the hero, and you get all your math problems solved. Throw on an extra helping of praise for your "savior", and helping you out becomes the highlight of their day.

Exactly! You play up being a damsel in distress, and once they see that, solving your maths problems isn't a chore, it's something they want to do. Shower them with praise while they do it, and helping you becomes the highlight of their day.
Really? You're hot, don't get me wrong, I'm just pretty sure I'd get bored of only ever thinking about one person, no matter how hot they were.
And you never get bored of only thinking about one person? I don't mean to be rude, you're definitely hot, but having only one person to think about, even if they are super hot, seems rough.
It's a military academy, yeah. The work really sucks, but my classmates are fun, so it's not all bad. It helps to have a lot of kind people around who are happy to help you out.
It's a military academy, so not a full-fledged army, but yeah. The work can be rough, but the people around me are always so nice and kind and help me out whenever I need it. They're pretty great.
...We're going to have to circle back around to the poker stuff. What do you mean "an expert at not looking"? Do you get blindfolded a lot or something?
...Sorry, we can come back to the poker stuff later, I just have to ask - how do you become "an expert at not looking"? Are you used to getting blindfolded or something?
I'm trying a bit of everything, right now. I've done necklaces, earrings, a couple of bracelets... you know, the works. Do you have an idea for something I could make?
A bit of this, a bit of that. I haven't settled on a favorite yet, but I can do all the basics. Why? Do you have an idea of something to try?
Aww, Noire, you're so nice, but really, it's fine. I'd feel so bad asking someone to, like... throw a hand or something, just because I'm new. I mean, can you even imagine?

You're so nice to me, Noire, but honestly, I'm a big girl, I can take it. Besides, I'd feel so bad asking someone to throw a hand or something just because I don't know what I'm doing. There's no way I could ask for that.

Ohh, that! I didn't know it had a name, I just knew it made me look hot. I'll have to remember that.
Zettai ryouiki...
My casual outfits are way cuter. I try to go for the same... zettai ryouiki thing, but with thigh-high boots instead, and it looks amazing. Plus, I get to show some more skin and add some ruffles.

Oh, nothing too exciting. It's a military academy, so it's all tactics and history and weapon skills. All the stuff I'm supposed to know in case I ever have to lead an army -- like that'll ever happen.

Oh, you mean like... properly romantic stuff? I'd be lying if I said I hadn't thought about it a little, and there are definitely a couple of options out there, but... I'm just not ready for any of that yet. It's kinda nice to think about, though.

Like... romantic, "falling in love" stuff? I wouldn't say I'm not interested in that eventually - I even have some thoughts about who might be good to settle down with. Just not yet. I don't think it's not worth thinking about, though.
Trying to hide all that stuff away is boring. Honestly, I think that if more people could just admit what they were feeling and then fuck it out, all of Fódlan would be a lot happier.
Being all secretive about that stuff is boring, though. If people were just more honest with themselves and each other, I think all of Fódlan would be a lot happier.

Exactly! I've been just guessing at which cards to swap, but somehow, I hadn't lost until now! Honestly, the chances of that are insanely low. But apparently they're not zero! I'd never expect something like this to happen.

You have no idea. I've been just guessing at random this entire time, but I didn't lose until now, which is crazy lucky. I mean, the chances of that are so close to being zero that I never thought this could possibly happen.

It's easy for me, since I just have to remember to do lots of high kicks and twirls and physics does the rest. For you... I guess you just need to try to face away from them as much as possible? I don't know if that's really safe, though...

I have it easy, since all I have to do is make sure I'm using lots of high kicks and flips, but for you... The best way to show off your butt is to be turned away from your opponent, but that's pretty dangerous in a fight. Hmm...

It's not so bad. I wear them because I like to flash people as a distraction in combat. So long as I'm wearing the uniform ones, the combat instructors can't get mad at me for it. Plus, it's nice to have everything match.

Well, I like to flash people to distract them in combat, and so long as I'm wearing the school-approved option, there's nothing the combat instructors can do to stop me. The fact that they match the shirt is just a bonus.
Oh, I'm not going to actually join the military. I'm at a military academy, sure, but once I graduate, I won't have to fight ever again. It'll just sound impressive when I get introduced.

If I was going to actually join the military, sure, but once I graduate, I'm done with fighting. Then, graduating from Garreg Mach will just be useful for sounding impressive when I'm getting introduced.
Have you ever considered getting that bug up your ass to take a vacation? That is why you're so cranky all the time, right?
Sure, I know how useful it is to distract your enemies and inspire your allies by looking good, but doing that and leading the charge? That's so much pressure! I'd rather stick to one specialty.

Well, yeah, looking good where everyone can see you is great for inspiring allies and distracting enemies, but doing that while you're leading troops is so much pressure! I'd rather stick to my specialty.
I've tried that, but everyone seems to focus more on me beating my opponents, no matter how cute and dainty I am afterwards. It's really annoying.

Oh, I know he loves me, he's just annoying about it. Like, he wants to meet everyone I date to make sure they're "good enough" for me. I had to go to Garreg Mach to stop him looking over my shoulder all the time.

Okay, starting with the basics - get them to help you with things. If they're good at something, struggle with it in front of them. When they step in to help you, make sure you thank them a whole lot, with lots of physical contact.

My go-to is to get them to help me out. If they're great at something, struggle with it in front of them. That way, when they step in to help you out, you can be extra full of praise for them - ideally, with lots of physical contact, too.
Yeah, good idea. I'll just try to focus on the silver lining. No matter how much this place doesn't fit a bikini, I can still make this look great.
Yeah, you're right, Noire! I've just got to focus on the positives! Sure, this place isn't right for a bikini at all, but I still make this look good!

Oh, Goneril is home, but it's not a country - it's just one of the regions that make up the Leicester Alliance, and Derdriu is the capital of Leicester. I like Goneril just fine, but it's mostly mountains, so it's not nearly as exciting as a trade hub like Derdriu.

Weirdly, spelling Derdriu is a nightmare. I'd never guess how it's spelled from how it sounds.
Anyway, Goneril Duchy... I don't know if my perspective on living there is the most objective. When the Duke of Goneril was your father, then your brother, you get it pretty easy.
I guess if you're hiding something as big as you are, you get better at noticing when other people are hiding stuff too. Sounds like a pretty hard time, to be honest.
Yeah, I guess if you're hiding a side of yourself like that, you'd start noticing when other people hide stuff. It sounds like a pretty hard way to live, with a secret as big as that.

That's the plan! It'll take some getting used to, not having all my friends from the academy around all the time, but that's a small price to pay for not having to deal with any more lectures or training.
Yep, back to normal. No more training, no more lectures... I'm going to miss seeing my friends as much as I do right now, but I can keep in touch with them with letters.

That attitude is exactly why you get so flustered and I don't. If you ask if the world thinks you're hot, you're ready for them to say no. If you tell the world you are hot, then it's no surprise to be treated accordingly.

It's exactly that attitude that makes all the difference. You can't ask people to think you're hot. You have to tell them that you are. You can't be surprised if they give you the treatment you told them was right.
Really? Uh... Where'd you get that idea? I don't... play lots of poker or anything. Claude's our resident schemer, not me.
Oh, please. It's not like I'm taking off anything that shows anything, and you deserve to be proud of how good you look!
Oh? Do you have your eye on someone? Or are you just worried you might be missing out?

state.text: H-Huh? Wh... C'mon, Lysithea, you don't need to do that! And this is way less intense than training anyway!

case.state: Oh, I'm not very good, so I'm here to play for fun and practice! I'm sure I'd just lose if I played against everyone else back at Garreg Mach.
Well, I don't know about high-quality... this is the uniform for my school. I'm just lucky that the tailors they hired to make it knew what they were doing.
I guess it's decent quality, sure, but really it's just a uniform. Aside from the belt, I mean - I picked that myself, and it's just an accessory. Nothing's about to start falling down over here.

Oh, you know, something that's more flattering to my best assets, probably in pink and black... I have a wardrobe full of outfits back home made by the best tailors in Derdriu, but I didn't get to bring them with me.
Really? Huh. I didn't expect you to have experience wearing skirts, but I guess I can kind of see that for you...
Oh, don't look so smug - of course I'm having fun! That's why we're here. Having you around to tease by not showing off too much is just a nice cherry on top!
Oh, you've already been picturing me out of my dress? Well, let's see how that stands up to reality.

Of course I'm still having fun - just because this isn't going exactly like I hoped doesn't mean I'm going to have any less of a good time beating everyone here. Now just get ready for an eyeful, got it?
But you have to... okay, fine, maybe there's still some kinks to work out before it's foolproof. You're not wrong there, I guess.
Oh, I guess so! I don't know, I'd just assumed you were younger than me because you're so small and stuff.
Well... okay. But if you change your mind, just say, okay?

Being more confident? Well, some people say stuff like "be yourself", but that's dumb, you're already being yourself. You should try acting like a confident person. Who cares if it's a lie? At some point, you'll get used to acting that way, and then it's basically true.

Oh, sure, like them, however you want to say it. I like just being direct. You know, "Hey, you're hot, want to go back to my room and fuck?" - or "go on a date" or whatever. For this stuff, simple is best, I think.
Sure, why would I be joking? I mean, I figured if they offer it, why not make my outfit match all the way down? Why, what were you thinking?
Well sure. Besides, different people like different things... and I might have not shaved too recently because I wasn't expecting to lose this many layers...
Huh? I... didn't really catch that, Bernie. Were you trying to ask something?
Oh! Did I not say that? Yeah, it's a military academy. All that basic reading and writing stuff, I had tutors to teach me.
Oh, I guess I didn't actually say that, huh? Yeah, Garreg Mach's a military academy. All that reading, writing, science, and stuff was covered by my tutors.
Oh, Fódlan's not made of islands, it's a whole continent! But Derdriu's where the best shopping is, and it's a port, so we can buy stuff from other countries and continents. There's a lot of choice.

Fódlan's not an archipelago or something, it's a continent, with nations and everything! But Derdriu's where the best shopping is, and it is a port, so we get all kinds of stuff from all over Fódlan, and from other continents too!

What can I say? The Goddess likes to pick favorites, I guess.
For what it's worth, I think you pull off your look super well too. It's totally practical, but you make it work for you.

Really, I think that's more because I know how to work an outfit than the uniform being good, but either way works for me.
Speaking of, your look's pretty good too. Super practical, obviously, but the way you wear it really make it work for you.

Oh? You think I could be delinquent in disguise? Sorry, no. Being subversive takes too much time and effort.
Actually, going away to Garreg Mach was my idea. It wasn't what I'd call a good idea, but it was still mine.

Well, I'm not against people I call "daddy" saying I'm a naughty girl, but that's unrelated to the military academy stuff.
Actually, I chose to enroll. Not my finest idea, I'll admit, but it's worked pretty well so far.
Oh, my honkers? My great set of badonkers? These dobonhonkeros I'm packing?
Well, this is basically just the same as being in a swimsuit. Just... not really planned.
If only I'd thought to wear a bikini under my uniform...
I wouldn't usually go barefoot in a dirty alley like this, but I guess that's just the price of losing. I'm still gonna complain about it, though.
Okay, okay, gotta lose something, I get it. My parasol counts, right? I've decided it counts.
Well, that's not a great start... Nobody minds me counting my parasol as a layer, do they?
Well, it was nice while it lasted. So long, cute pink sunglasses. You've served me well.
You know, it's weird. These sunglasses look pretty, but they're way better as an accessory than actually for looking through. The sacrifices I make to look so good...
I could handle having to take off my sunglasses, but without the sandals, my whole look's going to totally lose cohesion. Ugh, this sucks.
Honestly, this isn't that bad. I'm still breaking in these sandals, so they're not exactly comfortable. They are super cute, though.
Well, this top's gotta come off, I guess. Try not to stare too much, okay?
Ooh... Okay, time for my top to come off. And it's so cute with the frills and everything...
Okay, okay, no more stalling. The titties are coming out.
Ugh, I'm really down to this? Fine. I guess that's what happens when you arrive to strip poker in a swimsuit.
Seems like somebody really wanted to see me fully naked, huh? Well, lucky you. I even waxed recently, so I'm still nice and smooth.
Well, I guess this means there's no more hiding. I'm just glad I got everything wax pretty recently...
My gloves are a layer, right? They're not exactly exciting, but they're definitely big and bulky enough.

These gloves are cute, but I need to make a sacrifice somewhere. For the greater good.
...Well, my greater good.
I might have to spend a lot of my time on the battlefield these days, but I haven't let that keep me from looking my cutest.
For the amount of time I have to spend on the battlefield, I think I've done a damn good job of still looking cute.
Wow, another layer down? Keep this up, and you'll be getting a real eyeful pretty soon...
You really don't let up, huh? I don't have that many layers left, you know.
Ah, the perils of wearing a cute dress. Sure, it looks great on me, but it looks great on the floor too...
It's really come to this? You've seen how cute I am in this dress and I still have to take it off? So cruel...
No more panties for me, huh? Well, you'd better all enjoy the view, alright? If I were you, I know that's what I'd be doing.
This is my last layer, so... If anyone's feeling like throwing the next round, I'd encourage that.
Well, at least the crowd seems to be enjoying the show.
Are we seriously going barefoot in a dirty alley? Alright, my fault for not leaving earlier, I guess...
Are we seriously stripping in public? Alright, my fault for not leaving earlier, I guess...
Fine, I get it, I've got to take something off. This is enough, right?
So much for beginner's luck, I guess. Let's hope this is a one-time thing, huh?
Oh, this is actually getting kind of close. Guess there's no helping it!
Good news for all of you - I'm down to losing my dress, which means you all get to see my panties. Enjoy.
And there go my socks. Nobody get any funny ideas about me stepping on them, okay?
I guess my boots are coming off. Pity, they really made this outfit pop.
Wh-- Gah! Dammit, this is why I usually sit down to take these off!
How about this? It's mostly just decorative, but I guess it counts as a layer of clothing?
Good thing I wore this scarf-thing today. Seems like I'll be wanting all the layers I can get...
Well, you can already see my panties; it's not like this is that much more exciting.
In case you were wondering if there's a matching uniform bra - prepare to find out.
Guess I should have seen that coming. Oh well - just don't judge the hair, I've been very busy procrastinating.
Well, that's the last layer for me. You all get to ogle me properly now.
Time for the titties to come out! I wonder how big an advantage I'd get if I let you stare...
Ugh, hold on. I usually enjoy taking this thing off, but in the context of losing it's not so fun.
Well, it's only natural to be curious, and I'm pretty happy with my body. Besides, I'm a little curious about how you look under your uniform, too...
There's nothing wrong with a bit of curiosity, and it's not like I'd be against showing off for a cute girl like you. Besides, I've been a bit curious about how you look under your uniform too...
Well, it's only natural to be curious, and I'm pretty happy with my body. Besides, I'd been a little curious about how you looked under your uniform, too, so this game's been pretty good for me.

There's nothing wrong with a bit of curiosity, and it's not like I'd be against showing off for a cute girl like you. Besides, I'd been a bit curious about how you looked under your uniform too. I'm pretty happy with this for an answer.
Oh, I bet you'd love seeing me out of uniform. I'd be interested to see you down a couple of layers too...
Well, it's only natural to be curious, and I'm pretty happy with my body. I've been pretty curious about what you'd look like less dressed, too...
There's nothing wrong with a bit of curiosity, and it's not like I'd be against showing off for a cute girl like you. Besides, I've been curious about how you'd look less dressed too...

state.text: Any other day, and I would've been happy to prove it's natural, but I like to wax before I go out in a bikini. Guess you'll just have to trust me on that one.
Oh, it's completely natural. Hard for me to prove that, though, seeing as how I've waxed everything below my eyebrows. Bikini season's serious business. You'll just have to trust me, I guess.

case.state:

Well, it would be a crime to leave a bad first impression on someone like you, ~cag~. I mean, I could say that about meeting any cute girl, but especially a cute girl who's also the founder of alchemy.

Well, yeah, but there's no way the Leicester Alliance is going to war any time soon. The future heads of the three nations of Fódlan are all friends at Garreg Mach together. I'll never have to actually use any of this training.

Sure, but there's no war for me to fight. Almyra's "unbeatable" general is too afraid of my brother to attack us and risk his reputation. None of the skills I'm learning are ever going to do anything other than sound impressive.

I don't know, you were the one bringing up how I dress and present myself, Angela. Honestly, you should really get your mind out of the gutter.

Well, how am I supposed to know how a doctor thinks? I'm just a military officer, after all.
Now, who wants to check out my cleavage? This dress makes it look great.

Unfortunately, I can't take credit for designing them. I do make them look good, though.
Oh, I bet you'd love seeing me out of uniform. I know I'd like to see what's under that suit of yours...
Oh, I bet you'd love seeing me out of uniform. After all, I've seen you like that already.
I'm sure it's nothing, they probably clean all the time. Or, hey, maybe someone else made a shower for themselves. Who knows, right?
Got it - no asking people to lose for me, and ask Nami if I've got any rules questions. Easy! Thanks so much!
Well, that's okay. I've got plenty of friends who are shyer than I am, it's not wrong to be shy, just... different to how I do it.
Nuh-uh, not until you earn it. Either you make me lose again twice, or you don't get to see them. Come on, you can fight for that victory, right?
Aww, that's so sweet, Suzuya. I just wish I could have had some of the flair you did showing them off...
Aww, that's so sweet, Suzuya. Maybe next time I can show you what I like to wear when I'm out of uniform...
Hey, don't knock it until you try it. I've found it works pretty well. Oh, and sure, I'd fuck you. You have somewhere in mind?

Anyway, I think you should just keep it in mind as an option. You don't have to open with it, but it definitely tells them you're into their whole deal.
I haven't lost just yet, you know. This could still be as much of my pink as you're seeing. Well, for now, at least.

Aw, but it's so much more fun to spend my time watching someone like you train. That focused look you get is so cute, and goddess, have you seen your ass when you're doing spear drills? It's incredible.
Only sometimes? Is that because the rest of the time, you're too busy imagining resting your head on them? Don't worry, I won't tell.
I'm not-- Ugh, whatever. You can think whatever you like. I've got a game to play.

I didn't-- Ugh, whatever, I've got better things to do than argue with you. Feel free to leave or whatever if you think I'm not going to be enough challenge for you, Mr Poker Bigshot, but I'm just here to have fun.
Good to know we're back on the same page. Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got some very important cleavage to show off.
Good to know we understand each other. Now, I've got some boobs to show off. You have full permission to stare all you like.
Well, stick around until I've got some more of these layers off, and you just might get to find out.
Oh, it's completely natural. Get me to lose a few more rounds, and maybe you'll even get to see some proof.
I've heard of it, sure, but I've never tried one. I don't usually do unarmed combat. If you're offering, though, I wouldn't mind a one-on-one lesson some time.
I've seen other people try them, but I've never gone for it myself. I'm usually better with an axe than bare hands. Some one-on-one instruction, though? You make that hard to pass up.

Oh, ha ha, very funny. Ghosts aren't really attracted to nobles - you're just trying to make some easy money.
R-Right?

I might be a noble, but I'm not that gullible. There's no way ghosts would really be drawn to me like that just because of my blood.
...Right?
Oh, but the innuendo's so much fun! Building that anticipation makes the climax so much more enjoyable...
Oh, but skipping right to the end kills the anticipation. Isn't it more fun to let the climax build?
Hm... I don't know, seeing your teamwork skills in action seems very tempting... but I also absolutely want to see what you can do without any backup. Oh, decisions, decisions...
Well, I know that I definitely want to see what you can do working solo, but seeing you with a team to command... that sounds pretty great too. How am I supposed to decide...
What? No! I'm not dancing around anything. I'm just... You know, he's my friend! If there's gossip about us that I hadn't heard, of course I'd want to know!
What? I'm not dancing around anything! He's my friend! I just... wasn't expecting a question like that, you know? I mean, gossip about me and Claude that I hadn't heard? That was the actual surprise.
You can think of this as a teaser of what's to come. Feel free to stare, I know it's hard to keep your eyes off them.
Just think of this as a little taste of what you can hope for later. Don't worry, I won't judge you for staring. I'd do the same if I was you.

state.text: So long as the Goddess Herself doesn't decide to intervene on my behalf, I think that feeling's probably right. Don't worry, I won't tire myself out too much when I lose.

case.state: I'm telling you, it's natural... But if you want to pull my hair anyway, I can think of some circumstances where that could be arranged.
I can keep telling you it's natural, but you're a good agent. You want to see that proof yourself, right? I guess we'll just have to see if we can find you a reason to pull my hair...
I appreciate that. You seem fun, so I'd be sorry to start off on the wrong foot with you.
Thanks for that. I don't know how you got that immediate bad impression, but you seem like somebody worth getting along with.

I don't know about that. Holst's told me about plenty of apparently loyal soldiers losing their nerve in actual combat, or ignoring orders because they think they know better. I think there might be less difference than you'd think.
Honestly, that just makes me think they're even more alike. My brother's a general, and he's told me plenty of stories about supposedly loyal troops turning tail when they see real danger.
Oh? Then does that mean this is what you're excited to see? I had no idea you thought about me that way, Leonie...
What can I say? The Goddess just loves me, and knows that I'm not supposed to be wasting my time on training when I can be doing better things - like playing strip poker.
The Goddess acts in mysterious ways, and her mysterious ways made me really strong without even trying and gave me great boobs. I don't question her wisdom, I just accept it.
Oh come on, first you say they'd be a good distraction, now you're acting like you don't want to see them? You don't have to pretend for me, Sucrose, we're all here to see hot people strip.
I don't know, I'm pretty sure this is totally allowed. The whole point of the game is to see hot people getting naked, right? So showing off a little preview can't be breaking any rules.

Oh? Trying to get a bit risqué? I'm in. All you'd really need to do is change the shorts in that bodysuit to a dress, and swap your garters and stockings for thigh highs that stay up on their own. Then it's just a matter of keeping an eye on the wind...

Ooh, I like this side of you. Honestly, you could totally make it work, just by changing the bodysuit for a dress and the stockings for thigh-highs without garters. Maybe don't go for that when it's windy, though... Or do. That can be fun too.
Oh, don't worry, Sucrose. I know exactly what you meant.
Oh, Sucrose, of course I know how you meant that compliment. Don't worry, I'll make sure to keep it in mind.
Gags are fine, I guess, but I prefer other ways to keep a mouth busy. Good quality ropes, though? You can get a lot of fun out of those.

Oh, you're not wrong about that part. I just think it's more fun to get "punished" for "not doing a good job", or to be the one giving orders. I don't want to do work when I'm trying to have a good time, you know?

For the camera? I don't know... I mean, it's not that I'm against it, but I value myself enough that I wouldn't do it for free. You've got to offer me more than just a good time I could get anywhere else, you know?
Right, I'm letting you interview me because it's a nice thing to do to help you out. Maybe you shouldn't go insinuating nasty things about people if you want to keep them talking.

Right. I'm doing a nice thing for you, to keep your viewers up, just like other people do nice things for me. Personally, I think you shouldn't be going around questioning the motives of nice people if you want them to stay nice.
Oh, I know what you mean, believe me. Hints can be very powerful. Just don't forget you'll owe me, okay?
No! My family is-- Holst and I are-- Argh! I swear, if I had an axe with me, I'd show you just what the Goneril family is really known for, you self-serving attention-hungry circus clown!
And just what is that supposed to mean?
Hey, if other people do things to help me because they decide they want to, that's not me betraying them. I get what I want, and they get to feel good, that's all. It's a bargain, not a betrayal.
Oh, definitely. I think the highest I got in a single day was four, but I'm sure I could go higher if I tried. Seems a bit like taking the fun out of sex to think about it like that, though.
Oh, I guess so... Well, I guess all I can do is try my best, right? I might be new to poker, but I'll still give it my best shot. Can't expect anyone to take a loss for me in a game like this...
Oh, right... I'm still new to poker, but I guess all I can do is try my best to not lose too quickly. Can't expect any mercy in a game like this, I guess...
I guess you'll just have to find out then, hm?
Maybe. Only one way to find out, right?
I know how much he worries, believe me. I'm not about to go disappearing on him.
Listen, I disappeared for one afternoon when we were little, and he just about tore our house apart looking for me. I know how he worries. I'm not about to stop sending letters any time soon.
Okay, this is way outside my area, okay? I don't know what's normal where you're from, but this is just nonsense to me. Ask again when you've got a question that makes sense, okay?

Okay, clearly we're having two wildly different conversations, because you're just spouting gibberish and acting like I should understand. Let's just play cards, and next time you have a question that makes sense, you can ask that.
Well, it's nice to know I'm not the only one here for exactly that. It's a bit much to expect either of us could win, but we can at least try to have fun!
I wasn't expecting to meet anyone else here for the same reasons I am, but it's definitely not a bad thing. Chances are neither of us can win, but we can at least have fun together!

I don't know if they were "possessed" or "inhabited" or whatever, but they were made of rock and metal, like giant living statues. Super creepy. They still stopped moving after we hit them enough, though.

I'm not much good with magic, so I can't say anything about what made them move. I just know they were like giant creepy statues made from metal and stone. They still stopped moving after we hit them a bunch, though.
Makes sense to me! Ambushing a monster seems like the best way to take it down before it knows what's going on. I'll have to try that some time.
Well, it sounds like you know what you're talking about! I haven't tried launching an ambush before, but I should try it some time.
He's mostly alright, but when we're together, it's like he's always looking over my shoulder, you know? I love him, but goddess, does he have to know what I'm doing all the time?

He's mostly fine, but the way he's always checking on me when we're together is just... ugh. I mean, I'm not a baby anymore, you know? I love him, and I know he's just trying to care for me, but it's so annoying.

I guess I could, but I really like my style, you know? I don't want to dress up in scary black armor and yell about "Apocalyptic Flame", I want to be pink and sexy. Maybe it would work better if I had a wyvern to ride...

I mean, I guess I could, but big scary spiky armor just isn't me, you know? I'm small and pink and hot. I guess maybe it would work better if I rode around on a wyvern or something? I'll figure it out eventually.

What? No! I mean, yes, I'm next in line, but... I don't want to think about my brother dying, okay? Believe me, that's not happening any time soon, and definitely not before he has an heir if I can help it.

Absolutely not. Holst is going to live a long and happy life and have plenty of heirs and everything. I don't want the responsibility of being in charge, especially not with what that would mean for my brother.
Well, that's... If there's any lies on that scale being thrown around, I know that Claude will find them and show everyone the truth. Until then, I'm not going to worry about it.
Well, I can't imagine anything anyone could be lying about like that back in Fódlan, but if they are, Claude will uncover the truth. He doesn't need me getting in his way.
I guess so... Well, for what it's worth, I'm happy with the path I've walked, and so long as I can stay with the people I've met walking it, I'll go wherever it leads.
I think you've got the right way at looking at it. I'm happy with the path I've taken so far, and so long as my friends can walk my path into the future with me, I don't care where it goes.

Sure, you wanted to know what I wear to get guys' attention just out of purely objective interest. Totally believable.
Anyway, like I said, there's not some secret "courtship outfit" or something, you just make sure you're looking your hottest.

Right. You wanted to know what I wear to get men's attention out of, what, academic curiosity? Sure, I believe that.
Anyway, like I said, there's no secret "courtship outfit" or something. You just get out there and look hot.

It's a mixed blessing. With a bad lover, you can at least know they're done after one, but having to take breaks with a good lover is annoying. Some of them take that opportunity to eat you out, though, so it's not always bad.

It's got good and bad sides. There have definitely been guys I wished didn't have to take breaks so we could fuck until we both just passed out, but it does let you break it off easily after one round if someone turns out to really suck.
Oh, absolutely. Some women in Fódlan are only into men, some only like other women, and a lucky few, like myself, are blessed to enjoy both. I take full advantage of that enjoyment, believe me.

Oh, no, there are definitely women who enjoy sex with other women in Fódlan. Some women only like men, some only like women, but I'm one of the lucky few blessed with attraction to both. I take full advantage of that, believe me.
Thanks so much, Asuna. You just let me know if you think there's any advice you'd like on something else, okay?
You're a huge help, Asuna. Let me know if I can pay you back with some advice of my own some time, okay?
Oh, it's not always about good people and bad people. I know you know how much cultural influence can have on how somebody thinks.
I don't think that's a matter of anyone being a good or bad person, it might just be the culture they're used to. You know as well as anyone how much effect that can have.
I think it's fun in the same ways that hunting is for some people. You search for just the right item, and get to bring it home as your prize. Maybe I could show you, sometime?

Some people enjoy hunting - seeking their prey, and bringing it home to show off their bounty. I think shopping's fun for the same reasons. It might be easier to just show you some time, if you'd be up for that?
Right. Oh, and don't worry about me, I think this game will still be plenty of fun, even if I lose.
Right. Don't feel like you have to worry about me though, okay? Even losing seems like it won't be too bad in a game like this.

I don't think I ever really made a decision like that. It was more like... I know I enjoy it, and the people I sleep with enjoy it, and we're not hurting anyone, so why worry about it being a problem for somebody not involved, you know?

I don't know if it was ever a conscious decision, it just felt natural to me. If something feels good for me, and for the other people I'm with, and we aren't hurting anyone, then why should it be a big deal?
Oh, no! Kind of the opposite, really - he's a bit overbearing, so I went to Garreg Mach so he wouldn't be looking over my shoulder all the time. I love him, but I need my space, you know?
Huh? Oh, no, he didn't push me into going to Garreg Mach, I just wanted to get away from him for a while, and that was the easiest way to do that. I love him, but he's just so overbearing.
I haven't met anyone who doesn't like a little bit of flattery. It's an easy way to make people's days better, so why shouldn't I? I'm not trying to get anything out of it.
Of course! Everyone likes to be flattered every now and again, right? I just want to make everyone's days brighter, that's all.
Oh? Well, I'd love to hear what I could do for you. I like receiving praise even more than I like giving it, so keep that up and you could probably get me doing anything you wanted...
Well, it would be rude to turn down an offer like that. Keep the praise up, and I bet you could get me to do just about anything for you...
Ohh, of course. I was only thinking about your body, not what it contains. Maybe you could teach me how I should appreciate you?
I see where I went wrong now. I was too focused on your body, and not thinking enough about what's inside it. I'm sure a great alchemist like you could teach me to show the proper admiration, though.
Hm? Oh, no, no need to pay for it or anything, I just make things for fun. It can just be a gift, or a favor, or something like that.
Oh, no, I don't need money or anything! I just make these kinds of things because I like them. Just think of it as... I don't know, a favor or something.

Oh, we have separate places to train regular soldiers. Garreg Mach trains military leaders, not standard troops. You wouldn't get the Adrestian heir and Prince of Faerghus signing up to become regular infantry.

Oh, all the regular soldiers get trained in other places. Garreg Mach is for training leaders. After all, the Prince of Faerghus and heir to the Adrestian Empire both attend - they wouldn't be joining any old training camp.

It really is! It's so nice to meet another "fluent speaker"! *giggle*
We have to go shopping some time.

It totally is! I'm so glad I got to meet another "fluent speaker" here! *giggle*
We have to go shopping some time!

state.text:

...Queen, King, Ace, Jack, right?

Oh, Noire, you really don't have to-- Well, okay, I can't stop you...
