Oh, uh, by the way... I think I kinda owe some of you an apology. Noire especially. I've actually known how to play poker this whole time. I was pretending not to so people would give me special treatment.

case.state: It's a simple philosophy, and it hasn't steered me wrong yet.
It's a simple rule to live your life by, but it hasn't steered me wrong yet.
Sounds like we've both got the right idea, then. I don't know what I'd do without the rest of the Golden Deer to lean on.
It's nice to talk to someone else who really gets it. If I didn't have the Golden Deer, I don't know what I'd do.
Ohh, okay. That makes way more sense than what I was thinking. Not as fun, but makes a ton more sense.
Ahh, I get it now. Yeah, I was thinking in totally the wrong direction. What I was thinking was definitely more fun, but it didn't make nearly as much sense.
Ooh, that's a great idea! They shouldn't be too hard to make, either! And there's so many cute design options!
Ooh, that's perfect! Cute and easy to make, but with lots of ways to decorate them!
They say all's fair in love and war, right? I know that if I was supposed to fight you, that would totally work to distract me.
Sounds like a good tactical decision to me. If I was fighting someone who kept showing off an ass as great as yours, I'd definitely have a hard time concentrating.
Oh, I've got plenty of comfortable, sexy ones for days without combat training. This is just a fashion sacrifice I make to get away with the way I fight.

Trust me, I don't let the church get in the way of wearing something nicer on days without combat training. These are just the sacrifice I have to make for the instructors to put up with my personal fighting style.

That's a pretty practical way of looking at it, sure. Love's a weird thing, though, and finding love isn't something you can force. I can't pretend I have the answers, so my best advice is to just take opportunities when they come.

Yeah, love is... weird. There's so much out of our control that the best we can do is just go for it whenever it looks like there might be an opportunity. That's just my opinion, though. Its not like I have the answer myself, you know?

Sure, but there's no way anyone would be looking to start a war in Fódlan now. The heirs to all three nations are at Garreg Mach together and they get along great. Nobody's looking to break this peace.

I mean, sure, in theory that could happen, but the three nations of Fódlan get along great. All of their heirs are even at Garreg Mach at the same time. It would take something pretty crazy for a war to start now.
I don't know what a "lukstat" is, but... thanks? I think? I don't usually get praised for having courage.
I don't think anyone's ever said I had a "lukstat" before, high or low, but... thanks? I think? People don't usually go around calling me brave.
Well, if I'm going to be flashing people in combat, it only makes sense to coordinate my underwear as part of my outfit. I mean, having them clash would be embarrassing.
Oh, no, Bernie, it's fine, really! Let's just keep going with the game!
...Or you can just go back to staring. That's fine too. Feel free to ask again when you're feeling a little braver, if you want.
No, Bernie, I think that would look really cute on you! Besides, you should know by now that boobs aren't everything - ass can be just as important, and you've got that in spades.
No, Bernie, I think that would look really cute on you! You should totally give it a try some time!
I don't speak any other languages, but that's a compliment, right?
Well, I have to hope so. I can't go losing too many more hands than this, you know.
Really? Sounds to me like you didn't spend enough time staring down my shirt earlier. At least you understand your mistake now, and know not to make it again.

Aw, that's sweet, Adrien.
I mean, you're not wrong about me having plenty of offers already, but I'll still be taking any others that come my way. Speaking of which, were you...?
Oh? Am I that distracting for you, Senko? Well, maybe I can help you get some clarity... after the game.
You're pretty impressive yourself, Senko. I can't imagine there's anyone who wouldn't want a pampering from you...
Of course - but that doesn't mean I wouldn't be more than happy with an older companion, you know. Besides, you seem like you've still got plenty of endurance...
Well, it would be just plain rude of me to turn down an offer like that, Senko. I would love to have you give me a proper grooming.
Oh, but I guess you wouldn't have been allowed in here if you were only fifteen or whatever. Well, now I just feel silly.
Oh, really? I mean, I do that sometimes, but most of my sexy stuff is back at home, so I usually just use it when I want to go for that extra surprise, you know?

Look, Natsuki, I know my boobs are great - I mean, come on, just look at how amazing these titties are, right? But that doesn't mean yours aren't great too. They're little, but they're cute! Just right for you, you know?

Hey, there you go! You're shaved, I'm not. I've got my honky-bonky-doinky-boinkies, and you can lead the itty bitty titty committee, and there are going to be different people who want each of us. We're both super goddessdamn sexy, and we deserve to feel it.
Are you okay, Sucrose? I don't mind being stared at, but I prefer to get compliments out loud, you know?
Getting a bit lost thinking about me, Sucrose? It's fine, I get that a lot. I prefer to get the compliments out loud though, you know?

Huh... Well, it's not like I'm not doing those things too, I just haven't been showing people who aren't part of it. It's kind of a shame how many people miss out on getting to see how hot I look naked, so maybe I really should give it a try.
Hm? Oh, I mean sure, I guess I'm in pretty good shape, but I like to think that's just the Goddess showing a little favoritism for one of her best creations, you know?
I don't know about that last one, but you do seem like you know where to get the best herbs. I'm in!
What can I say? Sometimes the Goddess picks favorites, I guess.
Sorry if you were hoping I'd flash you my panties, I guess - I only do that when I need a distraction, and I just don't need a distraction yet.
Now that's what I like to hear. Feel free to keep those compliments coming.

The way I see it, if a lie makes someone happy and can't hurt them, it's better than the truth. Just start acting like you're great, make jokes about how amazing you are, and give out compliments all the time. It might not work, but it's worth a try.
...That wasn't supposed to be encouraging you, by the way. I'm not trying to get naked, even if it sometimes seems to come out that way.
The rest of this outfit isn't so expendable, though. Dropping a prop is one thing, but this outfit is way too cute to actually separate.
Just gotta hope I don't lose again too soon... I can handle losing my parasol, but the rest of this beach outfit is too cute to take off.
Oh well. I still look almost as cute even without them on, right?
There's some saying about rose-colored glasses, right? Some kind of nostalgia thing? I don't know. I'm going to miss having these sunglasses, though.
I think it's time for this bangle and ribbon to come off too. It's not like they're worth being called a layer themselves, anyway.
I should probably lose this bangle and the ribbon on my wrist, too. They matched the sandals, so I'd look ridiculous if I kept them on.
You didn't think I was going to take my actual bikini top off with this, did you? Knowing how to layer is an essential part of making an outfit look good.
Without that top to cover them, my fat titties are even more on display for you all. Oh nooo...
Okay, go ahead and stare. Wolf whistle if you want. My boobs are great, and they deserve to be appreciated properly.
Honestly, I'm totally happy to show you all my tits. They're great. It's the losing that annoys me.
Well? Is it everything you hoped for? Make sure to enjoy the view while you've got the chance.
Whew... Can't lose any more hands or I'm out of the game, now. Any chance you're feeling extra distracted now I've got nothing left to cover me up?
You know, I don't know why I didn't take these off before my belt, actually. Silly me! Always making those little mistakes...
Really, it would have been a much easier time unbuckling my belt if I'd taken these off first. I'm just such an airhead sometimes, you know?
War or no war, I'm not about to give up on being fashionable. It helps inspire my troops, you know?
If the Empire wants to take my accessories from me, they'll have to pry them from my cold, dead, perfectly manicured hands.
I'm not giving up on seeing the rest of you all naked and moaning just yet, though. I might not be great at poker, but I'm still going to keep trying.
...Alright, pity party's over. Time for everyone to enjoy how hot I look in my underwear instead.
...Well, so long as everyone acknowledges how great this thong makes my ass look, I guess it's okay.
I guess I could use my hair band and my earrings as extra layers... no, winning isn't worth that. I'm not enough of a masochist to ruin my hair over a game like this.
Go ahead and stare. I understand. Sometimes I even impress myself with how hot I look naked.
Were you hoping you'd get a sneak peek at my panties when I took my boots off? Sorry, you're gonna have to wait for the dress to come off first.
Keeping my feet looking this good takes real work, you know. Wyvern-riding boots are not kind on the ankles, and don't even get me started on the blisters.
Here it is, what you've all been waiting for - Hilda, fully nude. You can gawk for a bit. I understand, I've seen myself in mirrors.
It's a good thing I got a pedicure so recently. I like to show my best side, you know?
Alright, fine, you've all earned the right to see my boobs. Enjoy!
I get it. My boobs are pretty breathtaking. Stare if you want to.
Yep, it's a matching set. Simple and surprisingly cute, considering they're an optional part of the official school uniform.
You know, I feel like Garreg Mach should really pay me to be the uniform model. I make this look good.
That belt was only for fashion, so don't be expecting anything to start falling down, okay?
Don't go thinking anything's going to start falling down now, got it? My belt was there for fashion, not because I needed it.
Tadaa! Introducing the official Garreg Mach uniform panties.
These panties aren't exactly sexy, but I guess I'm showing them off anyway!
I always wear panties like this when I'm fighting. They're a surprisingly good distraction if you wear a short enough skirt.
Hey, you guys don't mind if I open my shirt a bit, right? This uniform is just so constrictive...
Oh, nobody minds if I open up my shirt now that that scarf's gone, right? It's just so much more comfortable.
At least I'll be able to get them back later. Wait, we do get these back later, right?
Sorry if you were all hoping for a show, but I'm not about to flash anyone my panties until I lose my dress - or I'm fighting you with my fists and want a distraction. Weirdly effective for that.
Now that I've lost my shirt, I guess it's time to drop the "clueless poker newbie" act too, huh? Well, it was working pretty well for a while.
Well, no more shirt for me, so here's the ace I had up my sleeve - I actually know poker pretty well. So let's get serious.
I guess I could use my hair ties as another layer... no, winning isn't worth that. I'm not enough of a masochist to ruin my hair over a game like this.
Huh... you know what, you kind of remind me of one of the mercenaries who worked for Garreg Mach for a while, Raynor. All scruffy and Dad-like.
You and my brother Holst would probably get along great, Kamina. He's all manly too, just... not as over-the-top as you. I bet he totally outdoes you as a big brother, though.
So, Kazuma, I hear you love offloading your work on people. Seems like a real jerk move to not even do it in a way that makes them feel good about themselves.
I've heard about you, Kazuma. If you're going to be lazy, the least you can do is make people feel good about helping you. You're just a tactless dastard.
You know, thinking about it more, I bet you'd get along great with my big brother Holst, too. He's in the military too, only... you know, not from the future or in space.
Look on the bright side! At least you get to show off for a pretty girl, right?
Just think of this as a favor in helping me stay in the game.
I don't know if that was a deliberate throw to help me, or just bad luck, ~target~, but I appreciate it either way.
Ooh, too bad. I really thought you were going to win that one, ~target~.
Sorry, ~target~. Just remember, the fun of the game is supposed to be in playing, not winning.
Now ~name~ is one step closer to stripping down completely? Oh nooo...
If it helps, you can imagine it's just the two of us here, ~target~...
Come on, it's time for the fun part, ~target~! Are you still trying to stay in the game, or are you done giving all your attention to those cards?
Serves you right, being all hot and thinking about flirting with me!
I'm already like this, I see this as just an eye for an eye.
Well, there's an image I'll be remembering.
C'mon, show off a bit! Give me something to work with, you know?
Go big or go home! Get stripping!
Well, I guess there are worse things to be seeing right now...
You're going to give me something nice to look at, right ~target~? You wouldn't just tease me now...
You don't have to stop at just one, you know, ~target~.
Sorry, better you than me! Well, better for me, at least.
Oh, was it you who lost, ~target~? I thought my cards were... never mind!
Wait, you got those cards and now you have to strip? I'm not sure I understand as well as I thought...
Sorry about this, ~target~, but I've got to take every not-loss I can get.
Oh! Did you throw that hand to keep me safe, ~target~? That's so nice! Thank you!
Just think of this as a chance to show off some more of your beautiful body, ~target~!

Hey, I know Edelgard can ride you kind of hard sometimes, Bernie, but I think it's just because she cares. I sometimes hear her pacing around her room at night worrying. I bet she and the professor sent you here to help you grow.

state.text: So, Bernie, is it helping to have a familiar face like me here for a game like this? Or does that just make it worse?
So, Bernie, does it help you to have some familiar faces around for a game like this? Or does that just make it worse?

case.state: Oh, Senko, I just had a great idea! What if the two of us have a spa day together? I can show you how to really relax and enjoy yourself.
Whoa! You can summon magic servants? That would almost make learning magic worth the effort...

So, um, I got a bit sidetracked earlier, with the ghost and stuff, but I still have questions about being a funeral director. Like, isn't it kinda dark and gloomy and stuff, being surrounded by death?
So, um, ghosts getting caught in clothes aside, isn't it kind of gloomy being a funeral director, Hu Tao? Being surrounded by death all the time?
Don't you ever take a break for yourself, Senko? Overworking is a serious issue, you know.
That scissor blade of yours seems so dangerous, Ryuko! The Golden Deer could always use another sword-fighter like you to join us!
So, Megumin, your explosion spell... that's black magic, right? I tried learning magic a couple of times, but it's never clicked for me, you know?
We don't have streaming back in Fódlan, but it seems like such a fun idea! I don't know if I'd want to show people everything I do, though...
Ugh, I come here to get away from training drills, and I run into some sort of exercise coach here too?
Hey Joey, you aren't hiding any knives, are you? That face paint of yours puts me on edge.
Gah! What are you doing!? Are you crazy?!
Oh no, don't tell me you're about to- not again!
Everybody down! She's crazy!
Aimee, please, you have to stop shooting those- GAH!
You goddess-damned dastard, if you're about to- AHH!
I know this is a weird question, but I just have to ask - Joey, you don't go to schools, dress up as a normal student, and murder teachers' dads, do you?
So, Ryuko, I heard your school's basically run by a student council Empress backed by loyal and powerful retainers. That's sounding pretty familiar...
So I've heard people talking about selling "Gamer Girl Bath Water" - do you know if people actually buy that stuff? And, you know, if they do, how to get started?
So you're like an exercise coach, right? I hope you're not expecting us to treat this game as training.

I guess this might be a weird time to ask, Senko, but I'm just too curious - what is it that you do to unwind after a hard day? Maybe a hobby? Everyone's got to have something they can do to de-stress.

So, Senko, I know you're all about caring for others and making sure they get pampered and all, and like, obviously that includes stuff in the bedroom, but... don't you have fantasies of your own? Some way you'd want to be treated?
You're some sort of cute fox-spirit thing, right Senko? So why do you keep talking about making other people comfortable? Aren't foxes supposed to be tricksters and liars and stuff?
Huh... what kind of place do you come from, Senko? I don't think I've seen that style of clothing before, but it's super cute.
Ooh, Senko, looks like things are really getting interesting. Are you really going to lose your panties before your socks? I have heard some people like to keep them on in the bedroom...
You know, Bernie, I was actually expecting your muscles to be more in the arms than the legs - you've got amazing draw strength, after all. Do you do a ton of squats, or what?
I was thinking, Bernie - Marianne's told me how good you are with the horses, have you ever tried horseback archery? That seems like something you'd be so good at.
Huh... a very effective but antisocial mercenary who fights with ranged weapons. You know, Revy, I think you're basically just a ruder version of Professor Nevrand.
Look, I get that a bit of bitchiness is a good way to protect yourself from assholes, but don't you think you're laying it on a bit thick, Revy? Do you actively want us all to hate you or what?
So, Fina, you're some kind of magic priestess, right? Do people worship the Goddess where you come from?
So, Sucrose, you do research all the time, right? Stay in and do work over doing fun stuff with friends?
Hey, Sucrose, you spend basically all your time doing bioalchemy and stuff in a lab, right?
Aww. You know, Sucrose, I'm going to be kinda sad to see you strip. That outfit is just so cute, I love it on you.
Aw, Sucrose, this is a little bit bittersweet. I mean, I like not losing, but it's such a shame to take apart your outfit, with how cute it is.
So, Lyralei, do you really live in the woods? Like, full-time? Because that just seems crazy to me.
I just can't imagine living in the woods all the time like you do, Lyralei. I mean, how do you even do something like that?
So, Sucrose, those cute ears, the ones that almost blend into your hair - they're real, right? They twitch and move like the real thing, at least. So... you're like... part cat or something?

Oh, by the way Sucrose, those cute animal ears are actually real, right? Like, I've seen them twitch and move and everything, so I assume they have to be. Is that from an experiment, or is being part cat normal where you're from?
Hey, Sucrose, all the stuff you've explored has been solo experiences, right? So, with toys and stuff... is there a shop for that stuff in Mondstadt? Or do you just make your own?
So, Sucrose, with all that stuff you've done on your own, you've used toys, right? Did you have to make those? Or does Mondstadt have a special artisan for that sort of stuff?
So how do you end up getting a cool nickname like "Ms. Fortune" anyway? Did you pick it yourself and tell people to call you that, or what?
How does someone end up with a nickname like "Ms. Fortune"? Do you pick it and tell people to call you that, or just get really good at gambling, or what?
So, Hu Tao, I heard you're a funeral director, right? Like, you just... run funerals?
So you work as a funeral director, right Hu Tao? And that's just... your job? Only funerals?
So you're really meant to be an angel, huh?
So this is what angels look like?

Okay, Sucrose, I have this idea, and I want you to tell me if it sounds crazy, okay?
I already hand make accessories, right? So... what if I branched out into making sex toys too?

Okay, Sucrose, I've had this crazy idea, and I need you to tell me if you think it's good crazy or bad crazy, okay?
So you know how I already make little accessories? What if I branched out into sex toys too?
So you're pretty well known in Daten City, right, Stocking? Everybody's heard of you, people sometimes give you free stuff, that sort of stuff?
So, Daten City basically belongs to you and your sister, right, Stocking? I mean, the people there all know and cheer for you when you pass, and it's a big event for them to see you in person, right?
You know, it's still kinda weird to me to think that you ever go to school, Stocking. I mean, I kinda figured angels would be exempt. Do you just spend time there for fun or what?
So, why does an angel like you go to school at all, Stocking? You already know everything you need to, right? So is it just for socializing, or what?
You know, with all the weirdness that I heard can go on in a place like this, it's nice to see another normal girl. You're in school, right? What sort of classes are you taking?

You know, I heard this place was really weird, so the last person I expected to meet was another normal girl like you, Mari. Can't say I'm against it, though. You're in school, right? What sort of classes are you taking?
So, Hu Tao, you mentioned how you deal with undead when they pop up, right? How does that happen? Isn't that what the funeral is there to stop from happening?
So I know you stop undead once they appear, but how do they appear in the first place? Isn't part of the point of the funeral to stop that from happening?
You're a performer, right, Miku? I love dancing, but I can't imagine doing it as a job. Don't you ever get sick of it?
You're a performer, Miku, right? Like, you get paid to sing and dance and everything? I love dancing for myself, but I can't imagine trying to do it for work. Don't you ever get tired of it?
Are you okay, Tomoko? You look kind of tired. Did you not sleep last night?
Tomoko, are you doing alright? You look like you've got some pretty nasty bags under your eyes. Did you not get any sleep last night?
Oh, Tomoko, you're used to being around tons of people you're already super popular with, right? Is it hard for you, being here? We don't know you yet, after all.
It must be so hard for you, Tomoko. I mean, you're so used to being super popular and surrounded by people who all know you, so to come here, where nobody knows you... It's gotta be a big change.
Okay, sorry, I just can't keep this up any more. Tomoko, you have to stop lying about yourself, okay? Or at least come up with a more believable persona.

...Alright, I give up. This is just too much. Tomoko, you have to stop telling obvious lies about yourself to total strangers, okay? I mean, the lying is fine, but you've got to make it believable, you know?

Okay, so, I'll admit I don't pay the most attention in lectures about the Goddess, mostly because they're boring, but whenever anyone talks about demons, they're always be scary and evil and... not like you, Charlie. So are they wrong, or are you weird?

I always thought that demons were supposed to be evil and scary and stuff, but you seem really nice, Charlie. Did I get a bunch of stuff about the Goddess wrong? Because I'll admit, I just skimmed those readings, but they seemed pretty clear about demons.
So, Erufuda, that outfit you're wearing... that's exercise gear, right? It looks cute. Definitely better than the regulation athletics gear Garreg Mach has.
Hey, Erufuda, you're dressed for exercise, right? That's a pretty good look, considering. Garreg Mach's regulation athletics stuff isn't even close to that cute.

You know, Miki, you're doing a pretty good job convincing me I need to spend a bit more time around country girls. I might even move to a farm or something, just so long as I didn't have to get up early or do too much hard work.

You know, Miki, your whole deal makes a great argument for spending more time around country girls. I'd totally move out to a farm or something, so long as I didn't have to do a bunch of hard work or get up early.

It's so weird to meet an actual member of a church that's not the Church of Seiros. Like, you have a whole different god and everything. I mean, I knew other religions existed, but only, like, in theory.

Wow, I never expected to meet someone who worked for a church that wasn't the Church of Seiros. I mean, I kind of knew people like you existed, but everyone in Fódlan is all about Seiros and the Goddess.
So, Barbara, you have to use a... what was it, a Vision? The thing to channel your magic. You can't just do that without a focus?
Barbara, your magic only works through your... you called it a Vision, right? It doesn't work without a focus?
Oh my goddess, this is actually kind of sad. That outfit of yours is so cute, Janet! How are you supposed to decide what to lose?
Oh my goddess, this is so hard to watch. That outfit is so well put-together, Janet! How are you supposed to choose a piece to lose?
My lips are sealed... but maybe talk to her yourself some time? If you're carrying around a naked picture of her, I'm thinking you probably like her as more than just a friend.
Just imagine everyone else here is already undressed, ~target~ - look, I've made it easy for you already!
Sorry, but a loss for you is a win for me!
Great, I just need some more hands like that and I'll win this whole thing!
Whew, and here I was, thinking I'd have to go to all the effort of taking something more off.
Ooh, I was hoping it would be you, ~target~. Not because I have some sort of grudge or anything, I just think you'd look really hot with less clothing.
Oh, did you throw that hand for me? It would be so sweet if you did. I'd totally owe you a cute dance or something.
All eyes on you, ~target~. Try to remember that it's because you look super cute, okay?
Come on, aren't you going to put up a fight?
Even if the battle turns against you, you have to keep fighting, ~target~! So lose this layer and get ready for the next hand!
I'm waiting, ~target~. You wouldn't want to disappoint me, would you?
I guess you just must not want me to lose again, huh, ~target~? Oh well. Guess you'll just have to imagine how hot I'd be.
Wow, I really might still win this, huh? Are my boobs just that distracting?
It's almost too bad I didn't keep up that innocent act. It's fun playing dumb.
Don't worry if you're having to reconsider your sexuality now you've seen me naked, ~target~ - that seems to happen a lot around me.
You could just take off a layer, or you could just forfeit right now and join in with me. Believe me, you'll enjoy it!
Well, I guess there are worse things to be seeing right now...
Come on, join in the fun already!
You're going to give me something nice to look at, right ~target~? You wouldn't just tease me now...
Feel free to just jump ahead to the good bits now, ~target~.
It's okay, your body is a beautiful thing! Never be afraid to show it off!
Sorry, ~target~, but this round it's your turn. If it helps, I'm sure I'll be headed after you soon...
I appreciate you throwing that hand for me, ~target~! You just keep that up, okay?
Sorry! Better you than me! Well, better for me, I mean.
Phew! My cute look lives another round! Oh, uh, sorry, ~target~.
It's okay, ~target~, just do what I do - take a deep breath, remind yourself how cute you are, then do it!
I know it's a lot of pressure to strip around a body like mine, but I'm sure you can do it!
Just close your eyes and imagine you're alone, if it helps. Or you can imagine that I'm still there with you, and it's just the two of us...
One step closer to the fun part, ~target~...
Don't worry, I get it, ~target~. If I'd seen me touching myself like that, I'd feel like getting naked too.
Ooh, I was wondering when you might lose again, ~target~. A body like yours deserves to be shown off.
Wait, it happened again!? Is something wrong with the cards to~background.time~?
What? No way! Even I know that's super rare!
I had all the stress of this round for nothing!? Come on, let's keep going.
So nobody's stripping this round? That sucks...
Wow, a full tie? I never expected to see one of these!
Huh. Well, I'd rather see somebody strip, but I guess it's kind of interesting to see this happen too.
Records that a tie has happened at least once. Easier than marking all of the lines.
I bet you would. I even had a classmate who totally had a crush on him... huh, I wonder if she'd ever come to a place like this. I bet she'd love meeting you.
Yeah, you both seem like pretty good guys, too. I bet you'd probably tell each other war stories and drink at the bar and... you know, whatever else people like you and him do.

I bet you would. Of course, Leonie was closer to him than I was.
I'm right about them having that same energy, right Leonie?
Gyaah! Watch what you're doing with that thing! I don't know what it is, but I know it's dangerous!
Fwaa! Are you trying to kill us with that thing!?
Gah, what are you- don't swing that around!
Really? I wouldn't think there'd be too many knights around in space. Don't you have giant ships that fly around up there? Axes don't work on something like that, do they?
Oh, phew. I was worried other people would be annoyed at the idea of counting small stuff like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Isn't it crazy how much small things like ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~ can tell you about a person?
Hm... I wonder if I could make ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~ like that...
Having ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ is fine and all, but there are definitely cuter options out there.
Come on, I know you can do better than that. Show us what you've got!
Well, that's a safe pick. I guess I can respect that.
Building suspense, huh? I get it.
With me here like this, that feels a little unfair... but I guess that's more on me than you.
Don't you want to impress the pretty girl with something a little bolder?
Aww, is that all? Sure you don't want to give me a little more to work with?
Well, it's not much, but I guess I'm working with the inspiration I can get.
We'll get there when we get there, I guess. But who fantasizes about someone taking off their ~clothing~...
Oh? Are you sure you don't want to pick something a little more... you know, exciting?
Well, that works, I guess. I don't know if it's really a layer, but whatever.
I guess I can't really criticize. I did basically the same thing with my first losses...
What was it that the professor called a move like that? A strategic sacrifice? Something like that.
Are you sure you don't want to play it a bit more risque, ~target~? Losing's really not so bad. I bet you'd enjoy it...
I would look so cute in ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~ like that. Don't you think, ~target~?
Fire arms? We have magic-users and brawlers, sure, but fighting with your arms on fire sounds like it would hurt you more than your enemies!
Definitely not. Bright orange hair, freckles, cute ass, she's hard to miss. Believe me, even if you don't see her first, she'll find you eventually.

Ohh! Right, duh, obviously. Well, hey, if you ever run into Holst, tell him I said hi, okay?
Oh, but... don't tell him we met in a strip poker place. I don't think he'd be a fan of that.
Sticking with small prizes, I guess. Oh well.
Looks like someone is trying to stretch this game out as long as possible. Well, two can play at that game.
Are you trying to split your outfit into as many layers as possible? That's so unfair! Only I can do that!
That's probably good tactics or whatever, but it's not a lot of fun to watch.
Come on, I'm on display here, and you're still taking off little things like your ~clothing~? Don't you think you should catch up a bit?
Not exactly going wild with your picks, huh?
You know, I bet somebody selling accessories right near the entrance to this place could pull in tons of gold. Not me, obviously - I'm a noble, I don't need gold - but somebody could totally do that.
You can't stall forever, ~target~. You'll have to start showing off eventually...
I wasn't done being fawned over anyway. You can show some more skin later.
Well, I guess you're not doing anything wrong. I was just hoping for something a little more substantial.
You're lucky I've got a good imagination, or I'd be a lot more annoyed about how dressed you still are.
You'd better get to the good parts soon. I'm not a patient woman, you know, and I'm not against tearing your clothes off if I have to.
Wait, are you trying to separate all your clothes into as many layers as possible? Rude.
Well, not every round has to be exciting and crazy. Sometimes it's just time to take off your ~clothing~.
Aw. Bye, ~clothing~. You were great as part of ~target~'s look.
You know, strip poker has a lot more talking about the clothes people are taking off than I was expecting.
Don't worry about me, ~target~. The view's not too bad, and honestly, it's nice not having to think about the game.
You know, I honestly kind of forgot you even could take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, ~target~.
Oh, that's some serious dark magic! I might not have an axe, but I'll still take you out with my fists if you try anything on me!

Oh, cute! I'm in the Officers Academy, so all my classes are about battle tactics and military history and how to fight wars and stuff. Super boring, but I got to make some new friends, so it's not all bad.

Ooh, I'd love to hear you play some time! All the classes at Garreg Mach are super boring military stuff - studying old battles, combat tactics, sparring, that sort of stuff. If I didn't have my friends to keep me sane, I don't know what I'd do.
Six moons, huh? I've never heard of anything like that. Everyone back in Fódlan follows the Church of Seiros. Well, everyone I know, at least. I find the worship stuff kind of silly, though.

I've never heard anyone talk about six moons - we only have one back in Fódlan, and everybody worships the Goddess through the Church of Seiros. It's kind of silly if you ask me, but lots of people are super serious about it.
Wait, Florina, don't- argh, doesn't she know she can't just leave!? Besides, having guys here is one of the best parts!
Oh! You're not just a butterfly! Okay, that's going to make playing strip poker with you easier.
Ooh, interesting! I don't know I'd want to live there if everyone's expected to work as hard as you do, Senko, but a visit might be fun. I'd love to take in some of the fashion.
Great! I'm trying to get a friend to come out and have fun, but she's shy like you. Do you have any tips on getting her to give things a try?
Perfect, you'll know exactly how to help. I've got a shy friend who I want to come out and do wild stuff with. How do I get her to loosen up?

Aww, that's so sweet, Sucrose - but we can both be cute together, you know? Oh, and don't worry, I'll get over you taking it apart, I promise. Especially since I'm sure it'll be almost just as nice when it's all on the ~background.surface~.
We can both be cute together, can't we? Don't worry, though, I'll get over you taking it off, I promise - especially since I'm sure it'll look even better once it's on the ~background.surface~.
Right! This is supposed to be a peaceful game. Though maybe I should have brought Freikugel if I could use it for an extra round...
Yep, just a friendly game! Though don't think that means I can't fight if I need to - emphasis on need. I don't want to mess my hair up if I can help it.
Well, that sounds impressive, but how big were the ant and the worm? Because I've seen some really big worms before, and that makes them way easier to hit.
Huh. Where is a worm's backside? I've fought some really big ones, but they just seemed kind of tube-y all the way down.

It just seems a bit weird to me - I haven't met anyone in Fódlan who--
AH!

Sorry if it seems like a weird question, we just don't have people dedicated to just that in--
AH!

Sorry, I don't mean to be rude or anything, it's just that whenever people talk about the Goddess, they describe her with flowing robes and huge wings and-- wait, were you even made by the Goddess? I don't know how this other world stuff works.

Sorry, that was rude, I just mean... like, all the pictures of the Goddess in the cathedral have her with flowing robes and huge wings, and you're-- wait, were you even made by the Goddess? Is this one of those weird "other world" things?
I'm just thinking that being famous like you are seems basically the same as being nobility in Fódlan. Does that seem about right?
I'm just trying to figure out this fame stuff, and so far, it sounds basically just like being a noble in Fódlan. What do you think?
That's not that big a deal. I know a ton of nobles, even a prince and a future-emperor and... whatever Claude is, I'm sure he's got some kind of fancy title too.
So what? I'm a noble too. The Leicester Alliance don't care about kings and queens; we've got a council.
Well, it's not exactly exciting, but I guess not every round has to be.
Well, you had to lose ~clothing.ifPlural(them|that)~ at some point, I guess. Just part of wearing an outfit like that.
Oh. I was hoping for something a little more impressive, but... okay, sure, that works.
That works, I guess. I probably don't have a lot of room to criticize layer choice, considering how I started the game...
I wonder if any of those strategy seminars I skipped would have helped with playing poker... Probably not, right?
Trying to hold us in suspense, huh? Well, I can't speak for anybody else, but it's working for me.
Safe pick. A little boring, but definitely safe. I can respect that.
I can't say I'm a big fan of standing around like this while I watch other people take off their ~clothing.toPlural~, but I guess that's more my fault than yours.
I know that accessorizing is key to making an outfit, but did you really have to count your ~clothing~ as a whole layer, ~target~?
Well, I guess this just means the next time you lose, ~target~, it'll be all the more exciting.
Well, I'd prefer something a little more exciting, but my imagination works just fine too.
Hmph! Do you really have to be such a tease?
Aw, is that all? Are you sure I can't change your mind?
Mmn... Oh, sorry. Kind of busy over here...

Are you sure it's not time for a bigger play, ~target~?
Not that you have to listen to the advice of someone who's already out, I guess.
Walking around, totally naked except for ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~... I bet I could pull that off.
Guess there's not much to do but wait around and watch now, huh? Well, I don't mind that too much.
Oh, phew! I was worried that counting something so small would be bad manners or something. Good to know that's not a problem!

Oh! ~clothing.ifPlural(Those remind|That reminds)~ me of ~clothing.a~ ~clothing.generic~ I used to have. ~clothing.ifPlural(They were|It was)~ never the same after my brother's wyvern got to ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~...
Ooh, you know what would be cute? Golden Deer themed ~clothing.toPlural~! I bet I could totally make them for everyone...
You know, it's really interesting how much the accessories someone wears can tell you about them. For example, I know that ~target~ likes to wear ~clothing.toPlural~.
Accessories are one of the most important parts of any outfit, and anyone who tries to tell you otherwise clearly doesn't know what they're talking about.
What do you mean litera-- OH GODDESS YOUR HEAD!
Oh yeah, I have a professor who-- WHAT IS GOING ON?! DO YOU NEED HELP!?
So is this... some new trend or something? Because honestly, I'm not a huge fan. I like my head where it is.
Wow, trends get weird around here. Sorry, but that's not for me. I like my head firmly attached.

You know, Pyrrha, it's kind of weird - everyone I know at Garreg Mach who uses a spear fights from a mount, but you don't. Do you not have good horses at Beacon or something?

It's kinda weird meeting someone who looks as similar as we do, Noire. I mean, we've both got a skirt and thigh-highs, we're both super cute, I even used to wear my hair in twintails... If it weren't for the color difference, we could probably pass for sisters.

Don't you think it's kind of weird for us to be meeting like this, Noire? I mean, we both wear a skirt with thigh-highs, we both wear our hair up, we're both crazy hot... If it weren't for the color difference, we'd look like sisters.

It's kinda weird meeting someone who looks as similar as we do, Noire. I mean, we wear our hair the same way, we've both got the same great sense of style, we're both super cute... If it weren't for the color difference, we could probably pass for sisters.

Don't you think it's kind of weird for us to be meeting like this, Noire? I mean, we both wear our hair in twintails, we both have a cute, frilly style, we're both crazy hot... If it weren't for the color difference, we'd look like sisters.
I'm so used to seeing you in uniform, Lysithea, but you're really making this look work for you. I love it!

You know, it took me a second to realize it was you when I first saw you, Lysithea. I guess I'm so used to seeing you in uniform, I forgot you can just... wear regular clothes. You're really rocking this new look, though.
I'm still not over you being taller than me now, Lysithea. I got so used to you being a tiny ball of magic power, but now you've really got the powerful sorceress look working for you.

You know, you're really rocking that wise sorceress style, Lysithea. I got so used to you being a tiny ball of arcane destruction, but you've really grown into yourself. You've even grown taller than me now!
Well, it looks like you're getting a whole load of new experiences today. Just have fun with it, okay?
You know, I was expecting to be up against a bunch of strangers here, but it's kind of nice having some familiar faces to play against.
You know, I was expecting to be up against all strangers here, but it's kind of nice having a familiar face to play against.
Wait, Leonie, you lost? I was... I mean, you should be much better at this than me, shouldn't you?
You know, Leonie, I've always respected the work you put into your body. I mean, your boobs aren't as good as mine, obviously, but I swear to the goddess, your ass is incredible.

If there was anyone who could get me motivated to practice exercise more, I think it would have to be you, Leonie. I mean, I've got you beat in the boobs department, obviously, but all that work you do totally pays off on your ass. I mean, damn.

Have you ever thought about accessorizing some more, Leonie? You've got your jacket, sure, but I bet I could find some stuff to fit your style - or make it, I guess, if the stuff in the stores isn't right.
Oh, I just had the best idea - you remember that dancing outfit from the White Heron thing? I bet that would look so good on you, Leonie! You totally have the legs for it.
So, Leonie, how can you stand being on horseback so much? Don't you feel like your legs get tired and your ass gets sore and stuff?
How is it that you spend so long on horseback, but I never hear you complaining about your thighs and your ass, Leonie? Don't they take a beating when you go riding?
Next time we have a formal event like the ball, you have to let me give you some dresses to try on, Leonie. Or... actually, a suit might be better? Hell, you could make anything look good.

Okay, the next time everyone's getting all dressed up and stuff, you have to come to Derdriu with me to go shopping for dresses. Or... actually, maybe a suit for you? You'd probably look great in anything, really.
There's the usual dorky-looking Ignatz I know! And right in time to strip again, too!

state.text: So, what's a girl like you get up to when you're not studying piano, huh? Parties? Dates? It's not all piano, right?
So, what's a girl like you get up to when you're not studying piano, huh? You mentioned your friends and brother, but it sounded like you haven't seen them in a while...

case.state: So, Shamir... Would it be too personal to ask what kind of debt you're paying Lady Rhea by sticking around? You don't exactly seem like you'd have a lot in common.
So... About that debt you're paying to Lady Rhea. Can I ask what that's about, or is that too personal? I just don't know how the two of you would even meet.
So... if I ask some more about this pointy-eared guy you're searching for, are you going to get all rage-y again?
So, Aaravi... if I were to ask about the pointy-eared guy you're looking for, would you explode with rage again?
Hey, Kora, you're a "blade", right? My family has this axe with a weird crystal in it that, and it sometimes pulses like it's alive... Do you think maybe it's got a blade trapped in it or something?
So, Kora, my family has this weird creepy axe with a big gem in the middle, and it sometimes pulses like it's... alive, or something. Do you think there might be a blade like you trapped in there?
...Hm. I'm no expert at this "responsible older sister" thing, but... I should be encouraging you not to play strip poker with people you've just met, right? That sounds like the responsible choice.
...Hey, Noire, if we're doing this "fake sisters" thing, and I'm supposed to be the older, more responsible one... should I be encouraging you to not play strip poker with people you've just met?

state.text: Y'know, Leonie, once all the fighting's over, there's going to be fancy events you'll have to attend, seeing how you're a war hero. You have to let me give you some dresses to try on, Leonie. Or... actually, a suit might be better? Hell, you could make anything look good.

Okay, once the fighting's all over and everyone's getting all dressed up and stuff for celebrations, you have to come to Derdriu with me to go shopping for dresses. Or... actually, maybe a suit for you? You'd probably look great in anything, really.

case.state: I've got to say, Jura, I love your sense of style. It's nice to see that even if the world changes, people still care about looking good.
Jura, as someone who appreciates how much work can go into creating a look, can I just say that I love that dress on you.
So, Jura, why did you bring a rapier, anyway? I mean, you fly around in space, right? Don't you have laser guns or something?
Okay, weird question, I know, but I've got to ask. What's with that rapier, Jura? Aren't you from space, with guns and lasers and stuff? Why use something so old-fashioned for you?
You know, I just don't get your type, Pyrrha - like, you enjoy training and hard work. Don't you just get tired of it all?
Beacon teaches fighting and stuff like the Officers Academy, right? Does that mean you've got a favored weapon, too?
Oh, darn! I'll be sad to see you take anything off, Pyrrha. You've got a great cohesive look going on.
You know, Pyrrha, it kind of feels like you're too nice, you know? You're not repressing everything, are you? You've got to vent somehow when you get all riled up.

Goddess, Pyrrha; tall, beautiful, and humble? You really are just about every guy's wet dream, huh?
I mean, don't get me wrong, I'm super hot too, but damn. Were you actively trying to stay single at Beacon or what?
Wait, so, Polly, you're really a ghost? One of our teachers died and came back once, but all that changed was their hair went green.
Is being a ghost fun, Polly? Dying sounds kind of painful, but the floating and going through walls seems really useful.
So you're a big gambler, right, Fate? I mean, I'm assuming, based on your... you know, everything. Are you any good?
You gamble a bunch, right, Fate? I mean, I'm just guessing, but that's the vibe you give me. Are you any good at it?

Oh, Fate, if you don't mind me asking, where did you get your hat from? It's got a great design, I'd love to talk to whoever made it and try their techniques.
I mean, so long as they're not too hard to learn.

Oh, hey, Fate, where does your hat come from? I'd love to try making one like that, so where better to start than the original designer?
I mean, I'll try it if it's not too hard to learn. I don't want to have to apprentice for a year or something.
Monika's your real name, right? You're not really some sort of evil clown assassin, are you? I just have to check.
You're not carrying any knives, are you, Monika? Sorry to ask, but I've had some really bad experiences with someone who used that name.
So, ~kumatora~, you're some kind of black magic specialist, right? Fire spells and stuff like that? Where did you learn to harness your magic like that?

You're a black magic user, right, ~kumatora~? I've never been able to manage much beyond a little zap of thunder, but you seem like you've got a lot of skill with fire spells. Where did you learn that?
Okay, I've just got to ask. Why are you in a place like this, Ignatz? This doesn't really seem like your kind of game, you know?
All eyes on you now, Ignatz, so now seems like the time to ask - what are you doing playing strip poker? I never thought I'd see you anywhere even remotely sexual.
So, Petra, did you have games like this back in Brigid? The cards part, I mean, not the stripping part.
Hey, Petra, did Brigid have games like this? With playing cards, I mean - not the stripping stuff.

You know, I've always felt a little like I don't know how to treat you, Petra. I mean, you're humble and casual and you hunt like someone like Leonie, but you're the princess of Brigid. You're more of a noble than I am.

You know, it always feels weird when I think about you being a noble, Petra. I mean, you're more of a noble than I am, being a princess and all, but you never make a big deal out of it. Should I be giving you more formal respect?
You're in a literature club, right, Yuri? What made you want to do that? I mean, I get some people like books, but enough to join a whole club for them? Am I missing something?
So, Yuri, you're in a literature club, right? How'd that happen? I mean, how much of a fan of books to you have to be to go to a club all about them? There's gotta be more to it, right?
So, Meia, that stuff about you coming from a world with no men... was being there good or bad? I mean, women are great and all, but I can't imagine not having any men around.

Okay, Meia, what's with this whole deal you've got going on? Like, we're basically the same age, but you're all cold and ultra-serious and boring. Aren't you going to let down your hair a bit while you're here?

Okay, I'm gonna be direct, since I don't think hints work for you, Meia: What's up with the ultra-serious act? I mean, we're basically the same age, so why are you acting like you're some old veteran who's bored of the world? Aren't you here to have some fun?
Ooh, it's always fun meeting a Pokémon trainer, you all seem to have a new favorite I've never seen before. What's yours, Cynthia? Something cute?
Oh, a Pokémon trainer! Okay, I always ask this, but what's your favorite Pokémon? You all seem to have different choices, and they're all so weird and cute!
So, Cynthia, what's somebody so rich and famous doing here? Hoping to pick up some sexy moves to show off to your boyfriend back home?
Aren't you rich and famous, Cynthia? Why come to a place like this? Trying to pick up some extra-special sexy ideas to show off to your boyfriend back home?
So, Samus, that armor looks super protective and all, but the color choice seems like... kind of a lot. Having that many bright colors makes them clash. Have you considered changing the style a bit?

So, I get that the important thing for armor is for it to protect you and everything, but that whole color scheme seems like kind of a lot, especially for someone as subdued as you are. Have you thought about maybe changing it up a bit?
So, what's a space warrior do for fun, anyway? You're all alone in that ship of yours, right?
So, how does a planet-hopping bounty hunter like you kill time? Doesn't seem like there'd be a lot of fun to be had in that ship all alone.
So, a special agent, huh? And a handsome one at that. I bet a guy like you sees all kinds of action.
Not every day you come to a game of strip poker and get to meet a handsome special agent. A guy like you must get caught up in all sorts of action.
So, what's a guy like you do for fun, Leon? Aside from meeting cute girls at poker games, obviously. You seem like you'd get all kinds of stressed with your work.
So, tell me, Leon, how's a guy like you unwind after a long day of secret missions? Aside from wandering into poker games and meeting cute girls, I mean. Your work seems super stressful.
So Laevatein, you and your sword have the same name, right? I wonder if I could get away with naming an axe Hilda...
You've got a special relic weapon, right Laevatein? Yours seems way less creepy than the ones we have at Garreg Mach. You wouldn't want to swap, would you?
So, Shamir... I've always been a little confused about how you fit into the Knights of Seiros. Are you an actual member, or just a mercenary the Knights hired?
Okay, I've wanted to know this for a while, but a good time's never come up, so I'll just ask now. Shamir, are you an actual Knight of Seiros, or just a mercenary hired to help them out?
So... are you okay with me calling you Laevy now? I feel like you deserve a cute nickname, and that was the first one I came up with.
So, Laevatein, how do you feel about nicknames? Especially cute nicknames, because I think you deserve one. I'm thinking Laevy, but that was just the first one I came up with.
So, Jessie, I'm not sure if I totally understand your job. You get paid to let people see you naked? Like, not even have sex with them or anything, just be naked near them? Is that right?
Okay, I want to make sure I understand what you do for work, Jessie. People pay you to let them see you naked, right? Not have sex with them or anything, just letting them see you? Is that right?
Oh my goddess, I love your hair, Ganyu! It looks so soft and fluffy, like you could just fall asleep in it. Such a cute style, too!
Oh, Ganyu, I love your hair. It looks so soft and fluffy, like I could just bury my face in it and fall asleep. It's so cute!
Fischl, you're supposed to be the... what was it, Princessin Di Vertilung? Is that a kind of nobility where you come from? We don't have those in Fódlan.
Fischl, you're the... Prinzess Der Fertlung, was it? I've never heard of that title back in Fódlan, but it sounds like it must be a type of nobility, right?
I've never met someone as... uh, someone like you before, Trixie. Is the whole "green skin, sharp teeth, pointy ears" thing common where you're from?
You know, Trixie, I've never met somebody as... I mean, somebody like you before. Is the whole... green-and-pointy look common where you come from?
So you're a big Uno player, right, Yuno? I hope you're not having too hard a time with poker having different rules.
Yuno, you play a lot of Uno, don't you? You're not having too hard a time adjusting to poker rules, are you?

state.text: You know, Leon, I've just got to ask - you're not throwing rounds to keep me from losing, are you? Not that I mind seeing what happens when you lose...

case.state: Damn, I thought you looked good with the jacket on, but you really just keep getting hotter, huh? Do they teach all the agents that, or is it just natural talent?
Wow, you started the game looking like a smokeshow, but you really manage to just keep getting hotter, huh? Do they teach you that in the agent training, or is it just natural talent?
So, being an agent means spend time around some pretty powerful people, huh? Probably not nobility, but definitely still rich and influential.
Your job means spending a lot of time around powerful people, right? There can't be too many people who deserve attention from a special agent like you, just the richest and most important.

state.text: You're not throwing to stay closer to me, are you, Leon? Not that I'd mind if you were...

case.state: Hm... Hey, Shamir, were you around Garreg Mach, back in-- Oh. Uh, never mind. Dumb question.
Hey, Shamir, were you at Garreg Mach back when my brother was-- Oh. Uh, never mind, sorry.
So why are you a champion anyway, Cynthia? Wouldn't you prefer to be an archaeologist all the time, and not worry about battles?
Why is it that you became champion, Cynthia? You prefer archaeology to battling, don't you?
You're a fencer, right, Asuna? I could totally see you doing that. You seem graceful and agile and stuff.
You fight with a rapier, right, Asuna? Just looking at you, I can totally see that. You're so graceful and agile, it makes perfect sense.
So, ~target~, I know you can create clones of yourself, but what about other people? Like... me, maybe? Just hypothetically.
So, ~target~, totally hypothetically, could you create clones of other people? I know you can make more of yourself, but what about someone like... I don't know, me?
The alchemy you can do sounds pretty impressive, ~target~. In Fódlan, we can use alchemy for potions and stuff, but you need a powerful magic spell to transform something into something else.
Fódlan's alchemy doesn't sound nearly as impressive as yours, ~target~! We can make healing potions, but transformations like you do need powerful magic spells.
You know, I've been to all sorts of delicious banquets made by the finest chefs in Derdriu, but I think you might be the piece of meat I most want to get a taste of.
You know, Leon, I've had all sorts of amazing banquets prepared by the best chefs in Derdriu, but I can't think of any piece of meat I've wanted in my mouth more than you.

Oh no, seems like you've lost again, Leon. I guess you're just going to have to get naked in front of a beautiful woman who wants to do all sorts of perverted things to that hot body of yours. What a shame.

Oh no, your last layer? What a shame. I guess you'll just have to get naked in front of the beautiful woman who wants to ride you like a wyvern until you give out from exhaustion. That's just what you get for being bad at cards, I guess.
Hey, Meia, what are the Mejare customs around being publicly naked? In Fódlan, men are allowed to walk around without shirts on and women aren't, but if you're all women... is that normal for you?

Huh... Random thought, but what's Mejare like about people being naked in public? In Fódlan, men are allowed to be shirtless, but women aren't, and I figure that's because of boobs, but... I mean, if you're all women, that's not a problem, right?
Okay, ~kumatora~, are you really a princess? Because I've spent a whole lot of time around a whole lot of nobles, and nobody that high ranked has ever been as fun as you.
I know you're supposed to be a princess, ~kumatora~, but I just don't see it. Nobody that high-ranking I've ever met is as fun as you are. So have I just been unlucky, or...?

Hey, Meia, if Mejare's really anti-men, does that mean you don't have any dildos, because they're too dick-like? Don't get me wrong, I like getting eaten out just as much as the next girl, but I always cum harder when I'm being filled up by something.

So, Meia, with all the anti-men stuff on Mejare, does that mean you don't even have dildos? They're based on dicks, after all. I mean, I'm totally happy with a girl's face between my legs, but it feels better for me if I've got something inside me too, you know?
So... How did you learn to do that armor-disappearing magic thing? Because I could totally do with something like that for after a long battle. Having to undo all those buckles and straps sucks.

I don't suppose you're open to teaching that armor-disappearing spell, are you? I could really do with something like that. Dealing with all those straps and buckles on armor is the worst when all you want to do is go to bed.
Hey, Asuna, what was that little thing you took off last time, anyway? Is that some kind of jewelry where you're from?
Hey, Asuna, that thing you took off last time - what was that? Some kind of jewelry from where you come from?

I know this is supposed to be a casual place or whatever, so... can I ask what's going on between you and Catherine? I know you're "partners" in the Knights, but you two seem really close. Is there something more going on between you two?

You can tell me to just shut up if this is too much business for your ~background.time~ off, but... can I ask what's up with you and Catherine? I mean, I know you're "partners" in the Knights, but is that all, or...?
So... body-doubles aside, what else can a master alchemist do to add some extra spice?
You've got me curious, now. I know about the body-doubles, obviously, but what else can alchemy do to spice things up?
So, uh, Ladybug, I don't see any fastenings on your suit. If it's not rude to ask... how are you planning to take it off?
So... Ladybug, how does that suit come off? Because from here, it looks pretty skintight, an I don't see any fastenings...
I wish I could do a flashy transformation like that to get changed like you can. Dealing with all the buckles and straps on armor is just the worst.
That flashy transformation magic you used to take your suit off seems so convenient. You have no idea how much it sucks to have to deal with all the belts and buckles and straps on regular armor.
So, if you were raised by witches or whatever, I guess you probably missed out on a bunch of normal growing up stuff, huh? Have you even kissed anyone?
So if you grew up surrounded by a bunch of witches, you must have missed out on all kinds of normal growing up stuff, huh? Have you even kissed anyone?
So what do you get up to when you're not being Ladybug? You don't just spend all your time waiting for bad guys to show up, right?
So, Marinette, what do you get up to when you're not being Ladybug? You've gotta have things to do in between when bad guys show up, right?

...Okay, Marinette, it's obvious you've got weird feelings about Ladybug not being really "you" or whatever, and I can't fix those, but I can tell you you're super cute with great taste in clothes, and that's all you.

...Okay, Marinette, I get you feel like there's a disconnect between Ladybug and the real you, and I have no way to fix that. But I can tell you that you're super cute and you've got great taste in clothes, and that's one hundred percent you.
...Okay, I know everyone must talk about it, but your hair is amazing, Caitlin. Taking care of what I've got can be a hassle, I have no idea how you'd care for that much.

I know it's probably the first thing everyone talks about when they meet you, Caitlin, but... I mean, I can't ignore your hair. Taking care of the amount I have is bad enough, but I have no idea how you could look after that much.
Okay, so if you're all alone in space, without any company, don't you get kind of... pent-up? I know I would.
So, if you're all alone in your space ship, just waiting for things to happen, don't you get kind of... pent-up? I'm sure I would.
So you're some kind of holy knight, huh? We've got one of those at Garreg Mach. You don't look that different from her, actually.
Darkness the crusader, huh? We've got a holy knight at Garreg Mach too. You actually look a lot like her, weirdly.
Honestly, Darkness, how many people really believe you're a pure, holy knight? You're obviously getting off on losing.
So do people really believe you're a pure, holy crusader, Darkness? Because we barely know each other, but I can still tell you're a huge pervert who's getting off on losing.
It's so nice to have another girl my age to play with here. I was kinda worried everyone here was going to be pervy old guys.
You would not believe how relieved I am to see another girl my age here. I was so worried this place was just gonna be full of pervy old guys.
So, Cheryl... If you're in a place like this, I guess you probably don't have a... boyfriend? Girlfriend?
So, Cheryl... If you're hanging around at sexy strip poker games, am I right in guessing you don't have a... boyfriend? Girlfriend?
So, Suzuya, if you don't go to school, what's with the school uniform? Is it just because it's cute?
Okay, Suzuya, I've just gotta ask -- Why wear a school uniform if you're not actually a schoolgirl? Not that you don't make it look good. I'm just curious.
Honestly, Suzuya, it's so nice to get to talk to someone who knows how to get the most out of a good outfit. That's not something most people can do.
It's so nice to see someone else really knowing how to make the most of an outfit. That's a valuable skill, Suzuya.

Y'know, Lysithea, I'd have liked if we'd got to know each other earlier. Ordelia's just West of Goneril, after all, and we held plenty of events. I know you're big on studying and stuff, but I bet you would've still enjoyed some of the parties if I'd been there with you.

It's really a pity you didn't come to more of the events we held in Goneril, Lysithea. We're just East of Ordelia, after all, and with me there, you might've even enjoyed going to a party over staying home and studying.
What's it like living in space, Samus? It sounds completely different to anything I've ever experienced.
You live in space, right, Samus? What's it like? I can't even begin to imagine, it's so completely different to everything I've ever tried.
For two people who both have pink hair, know how to appreciate fashion, and kick tons of ass, it sure feels like we're super different, Nonon.
We both kick ass, we both have pink hair, and we both know good fashion... It's kind of crazy how similar we are for how different we are, Nonon.
You're so lucky, being good at magic, Mitama. Learning spells seems so much easier than doing weapon drills.
You're so lucky you're good with magic, Mitama. I wish I could just learn spells instead of having to practice dumb weapon drills.
Um, Akko, if they were the ones who made my Freikugel, I think you should probably transfer to somewhere less... evil.
Well, it seems like it worked better than whatever your strategy was this round.
Oh, that would be-- ah, you've probably got better things to think about than my scarf right now. But yes please!
You know, Ignatz, those glasses really do suit your face and your whole... you know, attitude to life. Although, even with that, you seem a little overprotective of them sometimes.
Oh wow, I've never seen tattoos on anyone except Petra! What do yours mean?
Oh, are those like the tattoos the people from Brigid have? What meaning do yours have?
Oh, by the way, ~target~, have I mentioned how much I love your hair? I mean, I'm biased, obviously, but I think it's a super cute look.
Oh, ~target~, I can't believe I haven't mentioned how much I love your hair! I'm biased, obviously, but how can anyone not love that look, right?

Oh, you have pointy ears! Those are so cute! Archbishop Rhea's assistant, Seteth, has points like that too, only he hides them all the time, and when I saw them, he told me not to tell... uh, never mind! I didn't say anything!
So you went to a school where they taught you to fight too, huh? Seems weird that there are so many people who come here from so many places like that.
Beacon Academy sounds a lot like Garreg Mach, from what I've heard. Though our weapons don't transform, and we fight people, not monsters. Most of the time, at least.

Huh... You've got pointy ears. I know a guy with those, only he's...
Uh. He's the kind of person who doesn't show them off.

Oh hey, pointy ears. I actually know a guy with ears like that, but his are because he's secretly...
...Secretly really sensitive about them. Never mind. I wasn't saying anything.
It's getting hard not to feel underdressed next to somebody like ~target~. There wasn't supposed to be a dress code, was there? I'd have worn something nicer than my uniform...

So, ~target~, what is it that you worship? The only deity anyone really worships in Fódlan is The Goddess, but I can't imagine the Church of Seiros letting one of their ~target.ifMale(priests|nuns)~ play strip poker...

What's your god like, ~target~? In Fódlan, the only deity anyone talks about is The Goddess, but I'm pretty sure the Church of Seiros would never let one of their ~target.ifMale(priests|nuns)~ play strip poker.

I'm not the only one who's weirded out by a literal ~target.ifMale(god|goddess)~ being here to play strip poker with regular people like us, right? I'm not super big on religion or anything, but this is not where I expected to encounter an actual deity.
Well, I'd love to take you to a public bath or sauna some time - maybe even the one at Garreg Mach? We can figure details out later, I guess.

state.text: Okay, so I've officially met my first non-human person, but it feels rude not to ask you too, ~target~ - are there any special rules for how I should treat you? I just want to be sure.
Alright, I officially met my first non-human person today, but you're not human either, right, ~target~? Do I need to know anything special about you?

case.state: I considered bringing my axe, but I didn't think I'd need it. Do you really think it'll be that dangerous here, ~target~?
Are you looking for a fight, ~target~? Maybe it's a good thing I didn't bring Freikugel, it seems like having a weapon would only encourage someone like you...
Those glasses look so good on you, ~target~! The only person at Garreg Mach who wears anything like that is Ignatz. He's always so afraid they'll get broken...
I wish I could fly on my own, ~target~. I love getting to fly on the wyverns, but apparently I'm "not allowed" to use them instead of stairs to save time getting between classes.
Living in a world as destroyed as yours seems really tough, ~target~. I can't imagine what I'd do if something like that happened to Fódlan...
Hey, don't feel like you've got to be intimidated by me, okay ~name~? Just because you're quiet doesn't mean you can't make friends.
I have a friend just like you back at Garreg Mach, ~name~. She's so sweet and sad all the time. I bet you two would get along great!
Your school taught you to fight, right ~name~? Sounds like we have that in common.

Hey, ~target~, how do you feel about signing something for me? Seteth told me I could only get out of more training if The Goddess Herself wrote me an absence note, but I figure a note from any deity should work, right?

Oh my Goddess, ~target~! Your ears are so cute!
Oh, wait, do you hear super well like an animal, too? Was that too loud? Sorry.
They're just so cute, though!

Your ears are just adorable, ~target~! I'd love to touch them, and stroke them, and...
...Uh, I mean, if you're okay with something like that.

You know, you look pretty good like that, ~target~, but I don't think tan lines would suit me. That's why I always make sure to have a parasol with me when I go to the beach. If I actually wanted to tan, I'd have to do it naked.
I hope you're not counting on that mask to conceal who you are, ~target~. This is strip poker, after all.

I don't know if I really understand wearing a mask to a game of strip poker, ~target~. If you're counting on that to keep who you are a secret, you might not have totally understood the strip part of strip poker.

state.text: You know, I've never met somebody who wasn't human before - at least, nobody who wasn't a secret assassin. Are there special rules for how I should treat you, or...? I just want to avoid being accidentally rude, you know?
This is actually my first time talking to non-human people, so... are there special rules for this? Is it rude to just be normal? I just want to check.

case.state:
You know, ~target~, I think freckles are really cute. It's just so tempting to go exploring and give
each
one
a
little
kiss...
I guess so... I'd have rather just not had to untie it in the first place, though.
Well, it sounds to me like we could both get something out of this. You help with my scarf, I'm sure I can help with your bodysuit.
Well... if you say so, I guess. I don't know if Alois' puns have ever worked for that, but maybe he's just bad at telling them...
There's our usual dorky-looking Ignatz! Just in time to see ~target~ lose, too. Great timing!
Hey, don't feel too bad, ~target~ - if I wasn't winning, I'd totally want to be the person who's losing. I mean, it's kind of exciting, right?
Ouch, sorry ~target~. On the plus side, though... I mean, isn't it kind of hot being the person who's losing?
Looks like that's you, ~target~. Give us a good show, okay? If I was losing like you are, I know that's what I'd be doing.
Look, Toph, I didn't know I was going to be playing with a human lie detector, okay? So I doubled down and hoped you weren't actually that good! It's the sunk cost fallacy!
What? No, it's... it makes sense. It's a good strategy. It's psychological warfare.
Oh, thank you so much, Ignatz - that would be a huge help. You're the best!
I don't actually know what a Chimera is, but if it's anything like a Demonic Beast, then I fully get what you mean. Regular deer can still be surprisingly dangerous on their own, though.
If a Chimera is anything like a Demonic Beast, then I absolutely agree. Of course, that's not to say regular deer are pushovers either. Those hooves and antlers aren't just for show.
Wyverns are great! They're like huge lizards, only have wings instead of front legs. They are kinda hard to tame, but once you have their trust, they're the best mounts ever.
Yeah, wyverns can be a bit hard to get a good handle on when you start out, but once you know what you're doing, you wonder how you lived without having a massive flying lizard to carry you around.
I don't think I've heard anyone talk about sweets recharging magic, but I'm not much of a magic user myself, so I don't know! Maybe!
Well, Lysithea really likes sweets, and she's amazing at using magic... but I think she runs out just as fast as anyone else. I guess I'll have to ask her some time.
Well... Maybe. With a name as good as mine, can you blame me?
Well... I can't say that's not true. But I mean, come on, if you had a name like mine, wouldn't you want to do the same?
Just because I'm a noble doesn't mean I don't know how to have a good time, you know. I found my way here, after all.
Of course - I leave all the boring management parts of being nobility to my brother. I just get to enjoy having tons of money and free time. It's pretty great.
Huh? Oh, but I thought... huh, I guess I should have kept that to myself. I'm just lucky it worked out alright for me. Thanks for the advice, Ignatz!
Ohh, right, that's a bad idea in poker. Oh well, I know for next time now. I won't be making that mistake again! Thanks Ignatz!

Oh no, ~target~! Are you really going to take off your glasses? Won't that make it hard for you to see?
I guess it's either that or just forfeit...
Down to just your glasses, huh, ~target~? Well, what's it going to be? Forfeit now, and be able to see me easily while you do, or lose the glasses for one last round?
Whew, that was a close one! I thought having a pair would have protected me for sure...
Losing with a pair is rough, ~target~. You won't be holding a grudge that mine was better though, right?
Oh wow, nobody had to rely on a high card that time? Here I was, feeling confident about having a pair...
Ooh, looks like you almost had me there, ~target~. Have to be more careful, a pair can't always protect you.
Sorry ~target~ - you've got to aim higher with your pairs next time. That's the key.
Whew, that's a close call. If ~target~ hadn't been there to protect me, I'd have lost again - thanks ~target~, you're the best.
Ah, you've got to be more careful with picking your pairs, ~target~. Maybe if you remember that, you can beat me next time.
So you're really going to have to masturbate in front of the rest of us? Well, that's what happens when you sign up for strange games of strip poker, I guess.
Well... the rules say what they say. Looks like you've got to ~target.ifMale(start jacking off|touch yourself)~, ~target~.
Wow. Maybe the Goddess really did want me to win after all. Sorry, ~target~, but you can't argue with a blessing like this.
Wait, didn't I- oh! No! Okay, I guess I didn't lose this hand after all. Phew. Sorry, ~target~.
Isn't this supposed to be one of the worst type of hands in the game? How did ~target~ still lose to me?
Well, I guess I've got to thank you for the save, ~target~. Sorry you've got to strip, though.
Sorry, ~target~, but my high card was higher! Wait, just checking, that does mean I don't lose, right? Okay, good.
Whew, that was close. Uh, I think. Poker can be complicated, but your card was lower, and that means you've gotta strip. That sounds right.
Geez, talk about a nail-biter. I mean, not literally, I take way too good care of my nails for that, but I honestly expected to lose this round.
Ouch, and I thought my hand was bad. Thanks for diving in front of that arrow, ~target~.
Ah, and just as it looked like my luck was turning. I guess I'm safe this round after all.
Wow, even when my strategy falls flat, luck helps me out. If my body somehow didn't convince you I was blessed by the goddess, not losing with a hand like this would have to change your mind, right?
Sorry, but you'd need a higher card to beat my high card.
It might not be by much, but I'm still safe and you lost this hand, ~target~.

Oh well, I guess that's just- wait, ~target~ lost? That's, ah... that's good. For the rest of us. I guess.
Sorry, ~target~.
Well, I guess that's what I get for being a beginner in with---huh? Wait, I didn't lose that? Oh, uh... good. Great. I guess I have beginner's luck on my side...

I guess since it's still pretty early, you should probably pick something boring, ~target~. Build up to the good stuff.
Not that I'd complain if you did pick something big, though...
An early loss... that's free license to only take off something small. You should take it if you can, ~target~.
I hear these games can get pretty competitive and mean about taking off small stuff, but this early... I mean, what else are you supposed to do?
Are you picking something small, ~target~? That's what I'd do if I were you. No sense in losing something big this early...
Well, I'd love to see you take off something big and show off for us, ~target~... but this early, going for something small makes a lot more sense.
...Wow. I really did not expect it to turn out like this, given how things were a couple of rounds ago. Nice work, ~winner~.
Pretty sure I know what you're going to take off now, but a surprise is always nice.
When this hidden line fires, Hilda should start calling Laevatein "Laevy"

It's okay, ~ladybug~, we're all adults here. I know that if it were me in an outfit like that, with a hot partner in the same kind of ultra-tight bodysuit, nothing left to the imagination... I know what my top priority would be.

You don't have to deny it, ~ladybug~. We're all adults. Even if you didn't pick them because they were sexy, if I were you, dressed like that, with a hot guy, both of us with suits too tight to hide anything... I know where my priorities would be.
Oh, weird. So you guys just started being sexy animal-themed heroes at the same time by coincidence? I guess you were made for each other!
You both started being sexy animal-themed superheroes at the same time just by coincidence? That's so crazy. I guess you really were made for each other!
Right, of course you have a magic transformation too. That makes sense. Don't know if I'd want to be lit on fire every time I wanted to change, though...
