No offense, but if I had to pick a favorite transformation from yours and Ladybug's, Cat, I'd prefer the one that didn't make me think I was going to get burned.
Oh good, you don't burst into flames when you transform! I was worried after seeing how Cat Noir did it...
Oh, those look so cute on you, Petra! I could totally make you a pair without the lenses, if you want.
You know, I usually don't love the scholarly look, but those really work for you, Petra! If you wanted some frames without the lenses, I could totally do that for you.
I know, I remember, but it's been a while, right? I thought maybe you'd have changed your mind. You're allowed to have things that are just sentimental or pretty, you know.
I know, I remember. People change their minds all the time, though. I just think you could do with a few things that are sentimental, or, you know, just because you think they're nice.
I wish Garreg Mach let us choose our own outfits. We can style our uniforms a bit, but I had to leave so many cute outfits back at home.
It must be nice to have a school that lets you pick your own outfit. Garreg Mach lets us modify the uniforms a bit, but it's such a waste when I've got so many cute outfits abandoned at home.

Oh, we've got plenty of nobles around. I'm next in line for the Dukedom of Goneril - not that I'd want all that responsibility - and the Officers Academy has all sorts of other nobles, even the future Adrestian Emperor and King of Faerghus. You're pretty young to be ruling Imarnaktrike all by yourself.

Oh, there's plenty of nobles in Fódlan, and lots of the ones my age go to the Officers Academy with me. There's all sorts of future baronesses and dukes, and there's even the Prince of Faerghus and future Adrestian Emperor. I'm next in line for the Dukedom of Goneril, myself. It must be a big responsibility to be sovereign already, at your age.
If the Officers Academy had let us have armor as cute as yours is, I might have even trained more. I'm way happier now I can pick whatever gear I want.
I wish the school I went to allowed us to do that. If I had to train, it would have at least been nice to be able to look good at the same time. At least I've got that option open now.

Oh, we've got tons of nobles around. I'm next in line for the Dukedom of Goneril - not that I'd want all that responsibility. I even got to know the Adrestian Emperor and King of Faerghus when we all went to the same officer's academy. You're pretty young to be ruling Imarnaktrike all by yourself.

Oh, there's plenty of nobles in Fódlan, and I met lots of them at the Officers Academy. There were all sorts of future baronesses and dukes, and even the King of Faerghus and Adrestian Emperor. I'm next in line for the Dukedom of Goneril, myself. It's a big responsibility to be sovereign already, at your age.
Ooh, good question. I want to say... I'm the older one? But I only turned eighteen at the start of the Pegasus Moon, so you could definitely be older.
Hm... Well, you're definitely taller, but I feel like you still look younger than I do. I actually only turned eighteen at the start of the Pegasus Moon, so you could totally be older than me.
Ooh, good question. I want to say... I'm the older one? Not that I'm that old - I only turned twenty-three at the start of the Pegasus Moon this year.
Hm... Well, you're definitely taller, but I feel like you still look younger than I do. I turned twenty-three at the start of the Pegasus Moon, but I guess you could be older.
Of course I approve! It's practical, it's stylish, and it's totally you. I'm just glad I could help you be your best self.
How could I not approve? It's cute but mature, which is hard to pull off, but totally perfect for you. I'm just glad I could help you be your best self.
Tower over me? Come on, you're not that much taller than me. You're talking like you're Baltie-sized.
Okay, you are taller than me, but you're not towering over anyone. You're still Lysithea, not Dedue.

Well, sure, but that's what barding's for -- to give that extra layer of protection.
...Sorry, now's probably not the time for me to be talking about "extra layers", is it?

Oh! I think I've got it! It's the color!
All the stuff I've seen you in before was either uniform stuff or really earthy colors, like browns and dark pinks and stuff. This is the first time I've seen you in blue!

Oh! Duh! I can't believe it took me so long! It's the color!
The only times I'd seen you out of uniform before, you were wearing earth tones, like brown and dark pink. Blue is a totally different look on you!

Yeah! Now that's what I like to see!
I mean, like, body positivity in general. But I also like seeing your ass!
Oh, of course! I mean, yours aren't bad or anything, they're super cute. It's just that the Goddess blessed me with an incredible pair of titties.
It was probably a personal thing, then. They didn't have a heartbeat before that anyway, so who knows what was up with that hot mess.
Oh, that sound so fun! Is there some way I could, like... try out being a ghost? Or maybe get an invite to a dead-people party? I just want to try out some options, you know?

Very bad experience.
Not that just asking would reveal an assassin, I guess. It was just a weird enough coincidence that it seemed worth asking.
Well... yeah, I guess. The Monica I met used them for murdering people, so she was definitely a bad person. Not that she'd just reveal that if you asked her, I guess.
That sounds so much easier than training! Do these Magypsies do that for anybody? Where can I find them?
Mastering magic without even having to train? Sign me up! Where do I find a Magypsy and how do I convince her to do that to me too?
No, you don't have to go or anything, it's just... weird seeing you here, you know. But it's fine. I hope you do enjoy it here.
No, stay, it's fine, really. I just wasn't expecting to see you here, that's all. Here's hoping we both enjoy ourselves and relax, right?
Come on, you really expect me to believe that? Tall, beautiful, rich, famous, and somehow can't get a date? I'm not that gullible.
Yeah, and I'm Saint Cichol. Come on, I know I'm young, but I'm plenty old enough to know that when you're tall, rich, beautiful, and famous, finding a date is as easy as breathing.
Oh. Well, do you have her with you? You keep them in those ball things, right? Or does security not allow pets in here?
Well, I was hoping for cute, but that sounds fine too. Do you have her here, in one of those weird little ball things? Or were you not allowed to bring a pet to the game?
Well, to~background.time~ might just be your lucky ~background.time~. I have a couple of exercises I could really do with a partner for.
Well, this might be a lucky ~background.time~ for both of us, then. I've got a couple exercises I've been looking for a partner to try.
That's fair, I understand. I know how some people can get really attached to their weapons.
Oh, okay, that's fine. I guess it would be kind of weird anyway, with Laevatein being a sword and Freikugel being an axe anyway...

Ohh, okay. See, that makes way more sense now. I always thought you seemed like you didn't really care about all the church stuff as much as the other knights. Honestly, I think all the stuff about the goddess is kind of silly.

Ahh, so that's why you didn't seem like you cared about the church stuff as much as the other knights. That makes so much more sense now. I'm glad I'm not the only one who thinks that all the stuff about the goddess is kind of silly.

Poor guy, you deserve more of a break than that. You know what you need? You need a break. A real break, with somebody who can help you take your mind off your worries and live in the moment for a while, you know?
Well, that's clearly not enough. What you need is someone who can really help you relax, take your mind off everything else and let you live in the moment for a while.
Well, I would say that my purpose is to avoid training... I don't know if there are any axes with that purpose, though...
A shared purpose, huh... I just thought it seemed like a cool idea. I mean, who doesn't want something named after them?

state.text: Oh, it's not too bad, just some careful brushing, special products for when you wash it, and care from a proper stylist now and then. I bet you'd look super cute with a style like this, though. It would even match your horns!

It's just some careful brushing, artisanal products after washing, and care from a stylist now and then. If you wanted to try it, it bet it would look super cute on you. It would match your horns, too!

case.state: So it was just giving you a place to stay? I thought you'd done more than enough jobs for the Knights of Seiros to pay for something like that.
Oh. I guess I was expecting something more dramatic, considering how much work you've done for the Knights of Seiros. Haven't you done enough to have earned a place to stay for a while?
I thought you might say that. I don't see why you can't be both fashionable and deadly, though. You just need some more complementary colors.
I thought you might see it that way. Deadly doesn't have to mean not fashionable, though - you just need some more complementary colors.
Just reading and waiting for news? I could not do that. Do you at least still get good books out in space? Maybe some spicy romance novels?
Waiting for news and reading? No way I could spend even a week like that. Do you at least get exciting books out there? Spicy romance novels, maybe?
Call it an educated guess. You seem like you know how to handle yourself around the bratty princess type.
Let's call it an informed guess. Handling the bratty princess type doesn't seem new to you.

Good to know. If there was some super-secret place out there training guys to be as hot as you, I don't know if I'd have had the willpower to finish this game before I started searching for it. I can settle for it being talent, though.

That's probably for the best. If you told me there was a secret place where they trained guys to be as hot as you, I don't know if I could have finished this game before I left to try to find it. I guess I can settle for it being talent, though.
Hm... Tempting, but I'm not horny enough to just start throwing. Why don't we see if you getting naked can change that?
Makes sense to me. I mean, really, how am I supposed to get to know you when you've still got a shirt on? All that damn fabric getting in the way of properly getting close to you...

Oh! That's all? It looks all space-y, so I just assumed it did something, but I guess it makes for a cute accessory too. Do you think something like that might suit me? It couldn't be that hard to make my own...
Oh, so it's just weird space jewelry! I guess that's kinda cute. Looks kinda hard to make, but I think I've made harder. Do you think I could pull off that look? Maybe in gold?

Well, they've always just been kinda... there, I guess. We don't really give them special roles just for being men... Oh, but they are easier to convince to do stuff for you! Most of them love to step in and help if they see a girl struggling, so my work gets done and they feel like they were useful.

...Huh. I guess there's nothing we really need men for... Oh, but they're easier to trick than women, usually. If I look like I'm struggling, they love to step in and show off for me. My work gets done with no effort on my part, and they get to feel helpful.

Well, I don't know... Aren't there things you want to say or do, but you're worried about the consequences? Consider this your consequence-free environment. I mean, what are the chances anyone here will see each other again after this?

Socializing is one thing, but... Come on, aren't there things you want to do or say, but you'd be worried about people you live and work with finding out about? Well, nothing that happens here is getting back there, is it? Now's your chance to indulge those impulses!
Yeah, Holst was pretty big at Garreg Mach when he was there, so I wondered if you two had ever met, but... I mean, that would have been before you were a Knight, right?
Yeah, everybody knew Holst when he was at Garreg Mach, so I was wondering if you'd met him, but... you would have been still in Dagda back then, right?
Oh, only watching? I'd be happy to let you join in, if you were interested...
If you made something like that for me, you'd be welcome to join in, you know. Or you could just watch, I don't kinkshame.
Wh-- What makes you think that was why I was asking? I was just curious!
Wh-- Huh? I... Why would you think that was why I wanted to know? I'm allowed to just be curious, aren't I?

Well, I bet the skills you need for a rapier are still closer to the ones you use for other swords than the ones you need to swing an axe. It's hard to be dainty and graceful with one of those, believe me.
Still, I'd bet that rapier skills are closer to sword skills than axe skills, right? There's no way to be dainty or graceful when you're swinging around something like that, believe me.
Oh yeah? What's right on the line of "barely allowed", then? Fishnet bodysuits and pasties?
Well, where do you draw that line between decency and nakedness? What pushes boundaries? Floor-length skirt from the waist down, totally naked from the waist up?
I don't really know how it works or anything, I just know that when I drink the potions, I get healed. All that magic stuff goes way over my head.

Magic's never been something I understood, I just know that when an alchemist makes a potion and I drink it, it heals me. I leave the theoretical stuff to the people who know what they're talking about.

Oh, I totally get that. Being forced into doing stuff is the worst, and that super girly, frilly stuff doesn't seem like your style at all. I know a ton of great tailors, I'm sure I could find something that shows off your goods and doesn't make you feel like a cream puff.

You, wearing a frilly, girly waitress uniform? I know we haven't known each other long, but that sounds totally crazy. No, we could totally find something that's actually your style, but that doesn't totally hide what you've got going on.

What?!
 Okay, this is an emergency. I'm taking you on a girl's night as soon as this is all over, and I'm getting you something cute to wear that isn't going to get you confused for waitstaff.

I'm sorry, what?!
Okay, there's no way I'm letting that pass. Once this is all over, you and I are going on a girl's night, and we're getting you something cute to wear that isn't going to get you confused for a cafe waitress.
Phew! If you were an actual princess, but you could act like this, I was going to have to leave Fódlan and come live with you. Why'd they call you a princess, then?
Aw. Well, there goes that dream of leaving Fódlan behind and living somewhere where the nobles don't have sticks up their asses. Why did people call you a princess, then?
Well... I guess. I never thought of books as a social thing, though. I mean, when you're reading, you don't want to get interrupted for a conversation, do you?
I guess so... Books have just never seemed like a social sort of thing to me. I mean, the last thing someone who's reading wants is to be interrupted to talk, right?
That's exactly what I like to hear. I mean, a tight bodysuit like that, leaving nothing to the imagination... It would be a huge waste if it wasn't a sex thing.
Just what I wanted to hear. Having a skintight suit that shows off what a great body you have and not using it for sex stuff would be a crime.
What? Why's it such a surprise I'd be jealous of you? You're majorly cute, you've got great style, and you've got an amazing body. What's not to like?
What? You're saying that like it's a surprise I'd be jealous of you. You've got a killer body, great fashion sense, and your hair is super cute. Don't tell me any of this is news to you.

Oh! I... didn't realize you didn't know that. Yeah, they're supposed to be stand-ins for the feeling of having a dick inside you, but I guess that's not common knowledge if you don't have guys to have sex with.

...I'd figured that was obvious, but I guess in a world without men, you aren't used to the idea of dicks at all. That's why they work, though - because it makes it feel more like you're actually fucking someone.
Well, do you want it to be more? I think the two of you would make for a pretty cute couple. You know, opposites attract and all.
Well, how about this - do you want it to be more? I think the two of you could be cute as a couple, but it's not like I can decide that for you.
You mean the armor did that, not you? Even better! There's got to be someone around Garreg Mach who can design a enchantment like that for me. Does it work for putting it on, too?
Oh, even better! I'm not much good at magic, so having the armor do that itself is way easier than teaching me. Does it work for putting it back on, too?
W-What!? No! Seteth's all pale and has green hair! Why would someone from my world look like you?
Whoa! What the hell!? No! Seteth's pale, with green hair. He doesn't look anything like you. Why the hell would he?
Well, I wouldn't be so invested if you weren't so mysterious about it! Come on, tell us already!
Hey, it's not all my fault. You were the one talking it up like a big mystery! Now come on, spill it!
River nomads, huh? I'll have to keep an eye out for them. I don't know what they're doing being nomads if they can make a hat like that. They should set up a store somewhere.
I'll keep an eye out for river nomads, then. I don't know what they're being nomads for if they make hats like that, though. They should totally set up a store.
Oh. It seemed pretty small to be doing much of anything except being pretty. What's it do?
Really? It was so small, I don't know how it could do anything except look pretty. What do you use it for?
Whoa! That's a ton of stuff to stay on top of! How'd you get the time to come here on top of all of that?
Oh wow, so you've got schoolwork, a side job, dating, and friends, all on top of being the savior of Paris? How did you find enough time to come here?
I want you to know it's not just words, okay? Sure, being Ladybug is important, but you're a human too. You deserve time to relax, and to be told how good and important Marinette is too.
It's not just sweet, it's true. What you do as Ladybug is important, sure, but you're not only Ladybug. You deserve to feel good as Marinette too, and you deserve to be able to relax.
How'd you deal with that? I mean, a smutty romance novel is fun change now and then, but I feel like I'd go crazy without a real person I could screw.
Did that work? I like reading a smutty romance novel now and then, but not having anyone around to actually go to bed with... It's just not the same.
Definitely. I mean, it looked classy and all, so I wasn't worried it'd be dangerous, but I guess I was expecting it to be... I dunno, skeezier?
Oh, totally. I mean, sure, it seemed like it was established enough that it wouldn't be dangerous or anything, but I was still expecting it to be... I dunno, skeezier, I guess?

Who says it'd have to be behind their back? If I was in a serious relationship, I'd want it to be with someone who encourages me to do the things I enjoy. I just figure that most people aren't as open as I am about that.

I mean, sure, not telling them would be gross, but I'd want anyone I was dating seriously to encourage me to do the things I enjoy, this included. I'm pretty sure most people aren't as open as me about that, though.
But... I mean, you know that you could be getting the kind of treatment Dimitri and Edelgard get, right? Of you and them, I think you deserve it the most.

I'm no big fan of all the formal stuff, but I feel like you're a decent enough person to actually deserve it, but most people don't even know you've got the same royal standing as Edelgard and Dimitri do.
I guess. It just feels weird to see someone from space carrying around a weapon I'd see back home, y'know? It's not made from special space metal or something, is it?

Don't get me wrong, I know how dangerous a sword can be, but I didn't expect someone from space to use a weapon I could see at home and not look think twice about. It's not a special space sword or anything, is it?
A place where beauty is held as truly important? If I wouldn't be missed in Fódlan, I'd move there in a heartbeat.
A place where beauty is recognized for its importance... Fódlan could learn a thing or two from Mejare. In fact, I'd even consider moving if I weren't so attached to home.
Oh, you mean ~player~? Are you saying this is all because of peer pressure? Because I'm pretty sure the responsible thing is to tell you that giving in to peer pressure is bad, Noire.
Oh, so you're playing because ~player~ is playing? I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to tell you that giving in to peer pressure is bad, Noire.
Mmn, I would never say no to stuffing. Don't expect me to be satisfied with just one serving, though - I'm absolutely going to come back for seconds.
Careful there, Leon... I love stuffing. If that's what you're offering, expect me to want seconds.
Don't worry, we can work on that together. I can help you drop that boring dignity and replace it with some nice indulgence instead.
I'd be happy to help you with that. Dignity's just a waste of time. Indulgence would suit you much better.
We can't change that now, but... if you're up for it, I'd still love to make the most of it now that we do know each other. And this game's a good place to start!
Well, we can't do anything about the past, but now we do know each other, I'd love to make up for what you missed out on. It doesn't have to all be strip poker, but this is a good start!
Aww, but it looks so good with that outfit! I guess I get not wanting to bring weapons here, though...

Yeah... maybe like... a black three piece suit, but we get a pop of orange in there with a tie. Or maybe an orange waistcoat? I bet that would look super cute. It wouldn't be for a while, anyway. Lots of time to figure stuff out before then.

You could totally work a suit, and I bet with all the tailors in Derdriu, we could even find a dress you'd like. Maybe something like... I don't know. We've got plenty of time to figure it out between now and then.
Whaaat? It would totally suit you, and it'd even let you highlight your legs - which, for the record, they absolutely deserve. All that time you spend riding really shapes them up.

Really? I would have thought the sandals were totally your style. You don't usually go for dresses, but with that slit up the side, it wouldn't restrict your movement, and it'd highlight your legs. All that time you spend riding really shapes them up, you know. Those things are hot.
What? You honestly think there's nobody looking at you? With that body? Even if I hadn't personally seen people crushing on you, I'd think you had to be crazy.
...Leonie, are you blind or something? I know I'm pretty self-absorbed, but even I notice how guys line up to spar with you.
Wait, so you're basically training to use three different weapons, plus a shield? That sounds like way too much training.
But don't you just want to... I don't know, take a break and cut loose? Spend time doing things you like, instead of what's responsible?

Hey, who hasn't done that from time to time? Some people have very punchable attitudes, that's just how the world is. Chopping up a training dummy you've named after someone like that is nice and therapeutic.

Well, sure, but that's what barding's for -- to give that extra layer of protection.
...Wait, is it insensitive for me to be talking about how useful armor is when you have to take yours off? Sorry.
Sounds to me like you've got to start taking initiative, then. Find someone you think is hot, and suggest the two of you make out or go on a date or whatever. It's worked great for me.
Great! I have a friend who gambles a bunch too, but he's always losing. Do you have any tips for how he can stop losing so much?
Perfect! I've got a friend who gambles too, only he always loses, and he keeps needing help with money. Do you have any tips I can give him?

state.text: Ah, that makes sense. After all, the Imperial soldiers occupying Brigid wouldn't have anything to do all day besides wasting time and acting threatening. Of course they'd want cards.
Huh, I guess that makes sense. I don't think I've heard of anyone playing "strip dice" before, but I guess that would work just as well.

case.state: ...Huh? Oh, no, it's not because I think your name's too long, or anything like that! I give nicknames to people I think of as friends, that's all. I'm happy to call you Laevatein if that's what you'd prefer, though.

Oh! No, no, it's not that! Laevatein's a good name too, and I can keep calling you that if you want - I just like giving nicknames to people I think of as friends. I can stay with the full name if you'd prefer that.
Ugh, ew. Getting pressured like that is the worst. I could not handle a school like that.
What? Ew. That sounds like a nightmare. There's no way I could stay at a school like that.
Ooh! That might just be the most impressive way I've seen anybody strip anything! Encore!
"Really" read them? Is there something more to it than just looking at the cards? You're talking like there's a secret other layer of cards...
Huh... How do you "really" read cards? I mean, I thought I was reading them already, but the way you day it makes it seem like there's a secret way to do it.
What? Now? Like this? Why? Oh, uh... goodbye, I guess!
What? You're a party girl, right? How can your unfinished business finish before this game!?
That's probably going to be fine. That's going to be totally fine for you, sure.
You know, normally people would split everything into as many layers as they can... but yeah, you can probably beat me like this anyway.
You know, normally people would split everything into as many layers as they can... but I'm not exactly in any position to be giving poker advice, am I?
Gah! Is that fire!? Why would you make an outfit like that flam- oh, it's magic. Okay, whew.

Fódlan's all humans, no goblins or anything like that. The only place I've seen a goblin before is in the art for fairy stories. I didn't expect to ever meet a goblin, much less play strip poker with one.
Everyone in Fódlan is human. We don't have goblins outside of fairy stories, so meeting one in person is... a little odd, you know? For strip poker especially, but also just in general.

Okay, I admit I'm a little interested. What could be so exciting about your pussies to be worth hiding and calling a gimmick--
Oh. Yeah, that'd do it.
Ooh, I'm not getting caught in this again! Tell me when she stops glowing!

Don't worry, we're all watching--
Holy Goddess, that's so bright!

{small}Damn, that's a nice--{!reset}
Wait, are you seriously trying to...?

{small}Oh wow, that thong gives a great view of--{!reset}
Wait, are you trying to do what I think you're trying to do?
Do I... know you from somewhere, ~target~? You seem like you should be familiar...
Well, um... thanks, I guess. For going easy on me. That was really nice of you. I'll... try to make sure you don't have to do that again.
Well... thanks, I guess. I'll... try to learn quickly. For both our sakes, I guess.
Well, if you're offering, that really would be perfect, Ignatz. Yours always seems so neat and well-tied, it looks great on you.
That would be perfect - you're a real artist with those hands of yours, you know. Both with knots and, you know, art.
So, ~target~, you're a healer, right? Did you bring your supplies? I just get a feeling we might need them...

I mean, you wouldn't have been wrong, even if you didn't know you were talking about her boobs.
Seriously, she is stacked. And that's me saying that!
Does anyone have a shield!? Some armor!? Can we just take that gun away from her!?
How are we supposed to play poker with a maniac like this!?
Please, someone take her gun away! Before we all get shot!
I should have worn a swimsuit underneath my uniform... Well, none of you would mind if I went skinny dipping instead, would you?
I don't know if I really understand choosing to wear a swimsuit to a place like this... but hey, if you look good, why not, right?
Do you really think we're so dangerous that you still need to keep your weapon with you, ~target~?
Oh, you work with that weird stuff those freaky underground people used in their weird noisy city, don't you? I am not a fan.
Oh, you're a performer, right, ~target~? Like Dorothea and Professor Casagranda were in the Mittelfrank Opera Company! I always love to hear their singing!
I can't stand that heavy armor stuff. So boring and dull and difficult to decorate... uh, but it looks fine on you, ~target~!
So, ~target~, I hear you know how to get paid for just standing there and being pretty. How do I get in on that?
Just pretend we're not here and you're alone in your room, ~target~. You strip there all the time, right?
I was going to say you should just imagine the rest of us in our underwear, but I don't think that's much help any more...
No, you're fine, Fina. I'm not insulted. Well, okay, maybe a little insulted, but I'm mostly just ticked at my strategy not working as well as I'd hoped. You shouldn't take it personally.
You know, I've thought about getting glasses myself. Not to help me see or anything, just so that I can use them to get out of training exercises. Hm, now I say it that way, it sounds kind of bad...
Hey ~target~, weird question, but do you come here a lot? I just get this feeling you're probably banned from a lot of other places...
Whoa! That's... I've never seen magic used like that before!
Ooh, more clothing magic! Exciting!
You know, learning how to do that might actually make putting in the effort to learn magic worthwhile...
...Would it be rude if I was hoping ~target~ would lose again so we could see this?
I know we've already seen this trick a lot, but I can't help but enjoy it every time.
Thinking about it, this might be my favorite use of magic I've ever seen...
...Wait, you are sending those clothes somewhere, right? It would be such a shame to be destroying them...
I wonder if anyone at Garreg Mach can do magic like that...
Oh no, please not again...
Can you just take off your ~clothing~ like a normal person? Please?
Don't you think you've already destroyed enough clothing to~background.time~?
How can someone like you sleep at night, knowing you've destroyed perfectly good clothes?
You know, ~target~, I really don't understand how you decide what to take off when.
Well, that seems like a bit of a waste now... you know you could have taken that off earlier, right?
It had to happen eventually, ~target~. Your ~clothing~ couldn't stay forever.
Sorry, ~target~ - keeping your ~clothing~ only delayed the inevitable.
Aw, I thought the "naked except for one little exception" look was kinda cute. I bet it would be good on me...
Considering how hard you lost, don't you think you should pick something more impressive?
Oh! Looks like ~target~ is going to be the first to show some real skin!
Oh, you're going for your ~clothing~? That, um... I think it makes sense, at least.
Huh... yeah, I guess your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(work|works)~. Messes with the outfit, but I guess that's not something you think about too much in strip poker, huh?
Oh, good. Your ~clothing~ would've been my pick for what should go too. It just makes sense, right?
Ugh, choosing what to lose is so hard this early on. The wrong pick could probably throw you for the rest of the game if you're not careful...
So the ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off... yeah, I can respect that. Don't know if that's what I would do in your situation, though...
I guess it makes sense to stick to the small stuff while it's still early...

Hey, I'm not judging. There are way weirder things to get off to than a little exhibitionism. I'm just saying you might want to be more subtle about it. One of you wears a collar and the other one has a weapon explicitly for tying people up. It's a little on-the-nose.

Don't worry, I'm not here to kinkshame. I totally get it, the risk of getting caught makes it hotter. I'm just saying you could be more subtle by maybe not wearing a collar and tying people up with your "yo-yo", that's all.
Aww, you two are so cute together. Is it bad that I'm hoping you both lose now? I just want to see you two in action.

Aww, that's adorable! I love it when couples are lovey-dovey like that.
I can't help but hope you both lose now, just so I get to see what you two get up to...
Oh, and Ignatz, you should totally take some style tips from Petra. Maybe if you pulled your hair back to hide your face less, your glasses would suit you better.
You know, Ignatz, maybe you can take some style tips from this. I think having your hair back and out of your face, like Petra, might help those glasses look better on you!
Well... I guess I can't really blame him for wanting to leave after... that. Everything. Honestly, I'm considering it too.
Ugh, I wish! That would be such a good idea! There's no way Archbishop Rhea would let us do anything like that, though. She loves all the old traditions and stuff like that.
That would be so good, but there's no way Seteth or Archbishop Rhea would allow anything like that. They're always hung up on old rules and traditions and stuff.

Ooh, exciting! The Flame Spirit sounds way more interesting than the Goddess...
Honestly, it's such a shame that it's taken leaving the monastery to play strip poker for the two of us to talk!

Wow, it sounds like Brigid has way better traditions than Fódlan.
Honestly, I can't believe it's taken the two of us coming to a strip poker place, away from the monastery, for us to talk, Petra!

Ooh, exciting! The Flame Spirit sounds way more interesting than the Goddess...
Honestly, it's such a shame that it's taken a random encounter here for the two of us to talk!

Wow, it sounds like Brigid has way better traditions than Fódlan.
Honestly, I can't believe it's taken the two of us coming to a strip poker place, away from everything, for us to talk, Petra!
There's nothing perverted about wanting to show off your best assets. Feeling sexy makes you sexier. That's just science.
Wanting people to see you at your hottest doesn't make you a pervert. It's just common sense. The sexier you feel, the sexier you are.
Ooh, wow. You've really got some muscle there, ~target~. You could probably throw a girl like me around without even breaking a sweat, huh~?
How did you take that off with everything still over it? Was that... tearaway underwear?
Hold on, what!? How did you... but those... you're still covered! Was that magic!?
Wait a second! You've still got your shoes on! How did you take off your socks!?
W-Wait... you took your socks off... but you're still wearing your shoes? What? Why? How?!
No need to gawk, sure - but would you really blame us if we did?
Well, I guess... but I don't know if the people who run this place would let you bring a horse in here, even if you said it was a layer of clothing.
Maybe, but... I mean, there's probably at least a couple of people who'd object to you calling a horse a layer of clothing.
Well, I guess they do allow horses that look like people to come here and play... maybe they'd allow a horse to be a layer of clothing. Who knows?
Leonie, I don't need some kind of sneaky secret motive to say when somebody's hot. I tell hot people they're hot because it's true, not because I want something from them.

Leonie, please. When have I ever tried to manipulate-- Hm. Actually, that's not the best way to phrase that.
Look, my point is that you're hot and I wanted to remind you about that, that's all. I'm not trying to get something from you.
Who cares? If some asshole guys don't like it, steal their dates and show the poor girls what they were missing out on. Just be the best Leonie you can be, you know?

Why would that matter? Just wear what feels right. I still think you'd kill in the right dress, but if you want to go for a suit, that'll look just as good. Confidence is the sexiest thing anyone can wear.

Uh, yeah they are. They keep coming up and wanting you to do stuff for them so that they can have your attention for a while. Or did you just think there was an epidemic of weirdly tight lids in the kitchens?
What, when you're breathing heavy and glowing with pride at having just won? No, I'm sure they just hate seeing how hot you look like that.
I guess, maybe, but like... isn't it better to be great with one weapon instead of okay with three? Unless you're great with three, I guess...
I don't know, I've always thought it was better to train to specialize in one weapon... but if you can be great with three, I guess that works too.
I don't know, you say that, but like... the way you talk and act and move, it's like you don't even know what a day off is. That's what I don't get.

I mean, I guess you might be right, but when I look at you, I get this feeling you just don't stop. Like, even when you're taking time off you're planning what you're going to do when you get back to work. I just can't imagine being like that.

Well, that does seem fun, but it gives them the chance to fight back, you know? Like when you plan an argument in your head, and then they say something actually smart. Although if you're that good at fighting, I guess that doesn't happen to you, huh?

Well, sure, until they actually fight back. Besides, you can hack a training dummy totally to pieces, but not to a sparring partner, since, you know, that kills them. Though I guess you're so good you don't have to worry about resistance, huh?
Well, if it helps, I'd totally make out with you or go on a date if you asked me to, any time, any place. You've just got to get over those nerves a bit, and you could be swimming in hot dates.

I know if you asked me out, or even just, like, started making out with me, I'd be up for that, no matter what the situation was. Once you get over those nerves, you'll have no problem getting a date, believe me.
Oh, ew. I've never heard of that happening with any of the magic we get taught. Never mind, I'll stick to hitting things with my axe.
A fever? Like, getting all sick and sweaty and feeling awful? Ew, no thanks. I'll just stick to using my axe.

I guess travel might make things harder for committed relationships... but you're rich, right? Couldn't you just bring a guy with you if you have to travel for work? It just doesn't sound like that hard a problem to me.
Aren't you pretty rich, though? If traveling for work is such a problem, couldn't you just take him with you when you go? I don't know, it doesn't sound like that tough of a problem to me.
Oh! Okay, wow! That's... She's bigger than I was expecting! I didn't know Pokémon even got that big...
Wh-- Oh! That's... You weren't kidding about her being big, huh? I've met wyverns smaller than that. All the Pokémon I'd seen before were... much smaller.

No, I don't think so. Especially if it's a unique weapon, and especially especially if you share a name. It might be a bit weird if you were that attached to an old wooden training sword, but a sword like that is definitely special.
It can be weird, but only if there's no reason to be attached. You've had Laevatein your whole life, right? It's a one-of-a-kind sword. Of course you'd be sentimental about it.

Well, yeah, I guess... Swords just seem so much harder to learn. Swinging an axe or stabbing with a spear comes totally naturally to me, but all that fancy swordwork with parries and lunges and stuff feels all wrong.
Yeah, maybe... Swords just feel so clunky to me. Like the blade's always too close to my hand. I'm so much better with an axe, or even a spear. Swords are just hard work, you know?
I'd never say that to Marianne or Seteth or anybody like that, but I'm glad to know that I'm not the only one who feels that way. Thanks, Shamir.
Of course, I'd never say anything like that to Marianne or Ignatz or Catherine. It's just nice to know that there's at least one other person at Garreg Mach who gets it.
I know, I know. My teachers tell me that all the time. That doesn't make it any less hard work, though, and you always end up all sweaty and tired and... ugh.
Yeah, yeah, I know it's supposed to be good for me and everything, but that doesn't make it fun. You always end up tired and sweaty and gross.

...Huh. So, wait, you were named after the sword your parents wanted to give you to fight with? That's messed up. I'm glad you managed to get past that and make your name your own, but that's still super creepy of them.
Hold up, Laevatein the person was named after Laevatein the sword? What kind of fucked up parents do that? I mean, I'm glad you made your name your own, but that would screw with any kid.
Well, so long as they're easy to ignore, that doesn't sound so bad. I definitely appreciate you coming here over studying.
Well, if they're easy enough to ignore, then that doesn't sound too bad. I definitely prefer you coming here over studying.
Of course! Well, so long as you want to be friends. This might not be the most usual place to make friends, but who says we have to do things the usual way, anyway?
Of course! This might not be the most usual place to make friends, but I'd happily call you my friend if you'd let me.
Maybe not the most subtle... But that's just what a place like this is for, right?
There might be some hints here and there, yeah. But who could blame you? That's what a place like this is for, right?
I might be. Or maybe I just like getting attention from hot guys. That's for me to know and you to find out, investigator.
Maybe. Or maybe I'm just flirting with you because you're hot and I like the attention. An investigator like you should be able to figure that out no problem, right?
Well, I guess if anyone knows when you're done, it'll be you. I hope it won't be too soon, though - it's nice to have a knight like you around.
I guess you're the only person who can decide something like that for yourself. Well, I hope you don't pay it off too soon - it's nice having a knight as level-headed as you around.
Oh, I've tried all sorts of styles, but this one's my favorite at the moment. It's hard to beat something so cute!
Oh, I've changed it plenty of times before, but this one is my favorite right now. It's exactly the right kind of cute for me.
Oh, definitely. Personally, I think most of them just aren't creative enough. Having resources is nice and all, but the important part is knowing how to use them.
Very smart. The thing about those types of girls, though, is that most aren't creative enough. Sure, they might have resources, but the important part is knowing how to use them.
Oh, that's fine, I don't mind getting stared at. In fact, with the right outfit, an accessory like that could have a whole ballroom's eyes on me.
I get plenty of people staring at me already, so I wouldn't mind a few more. With one of those and the right outfit, I'd have all eyes on me the moment I walked into any event.
Well, if you don't want to take it, getting help from anyone can be rough. Personally, I love having people do things for me.
Having to take help from someone you don't want to feels pretty bad, definitely. I'm a big fan of getting help from people who offer it, though.
Though... You know, if this really is all just talent on your part, it does make me wonder just how far your talents extend...
Although... If you're really this talented, I'm feeling tempted to find out just how far these talents of yours extend...
Ooh, very persuasive. This is the kind of diplomatic negotiation I can really get into.
Mmm, much better. Clothes are so overrated, don't you think? I certainly wouldn't want something like that getting between us.
Okay, standing ba-- Oh, wow!
Hm? Okay, I'll just-- Oh! Wow!
Well, as long as it keeps you happy, I guess. I just can't imagine spending so much time with only books for company.
I'd go nuts spending so much time with only books for company, but if it works for you, I guess that's good.

I'm already expressing myself - I'm having fun playing the game, and seeing hot people strip. I'm happy when I win, and annoyed when I lose. You act like you're some impartial observer whatever happens. Maybe if you let that guard down a bit, you'd have a better time?

I am expressing my feelings. When I win, I'm happy to see hot people strip. When I lose, I get annoyed. You just act like it doesn't affect you, whatever happens. You have feelings, right? You should let yourself feel them sometimes.

Sometimes that's just the way things turn out, I guess. I'd love to be better with a sword and seem all graceful like you, but axes and lances just feel more natural in my hands. Not that it would make much difference to an opponent, though!

Sometimes we just have to accept that things are the way they are, I guess. If I could choose, I'd want to be a beautiful, graceful swordswoman, but I'm a hundred times better with an axe than any rapier. Not that any of this would matter to an opponent!
Huh... I was expecting things on a whole other planet to be really different, but I guess there's not that much cultural difference after all. That's... kind of disappointing.
Huh. I was ready for culture from a whole other planet to be really different, but... I guess not. I'm a little disappointed, honestly.
Well, I... I guess it's not like I've never thought about it... Maybe even wanted to be the person I was fucking so that I could see how hot I am...

Well, with how hot I am, it would be weird if I hadn't thought about it a bit, you know... I might have even considered looking for a body-swapping spell so that I could be the one who gets to enjoy how good I look...
You want to fuck me, I want to fuck me, it's just natural. I wouldn't be opposed to adding a couple more bodies to the mix, either... You've got some more copies of yourself already, right?
I don't blame you, we both know how totally fuckable I am. By the way, you have some more copies of yourself, don't you? I wouldn't be against turning this threesome into a moresome, either...
Well, maybe I'll get the chance to introduce you two some time. He's always looking for new talent to help up at Fódlan's Locket.
I guess I'll have to be the one to introduce you two, then. I bet he'd love to talk strategy with someone like you, and Fódlan's Locket can always do with more good leaders.

Oh, totally, yeah. You don't seem like a killer.
{small}Although I guess the other Monica didn't either...

Well, yeah, I guess that's--
Wait, how do you know how she spelled her name!?
Ohh! So it's like a club about books, not a club for reading? That makes a lot more sense. Still not for me, though. I get enough reading from my classes.

So you mean it's a club for talking about books, not a club for reading? That makes so much more sense! I don't think I'd ever join one, though - I have to do plenty of reading for my classes already.

Ohh! Is that what this is about? I can understand being jealous of my bahonkadonkers, but you're just as pretty as I am! I will not stand for you telling yourself any dumb lies about you not being pretty enough!

What? Is that all? Girl, have you not seen yourself in a mirror lately? I might have the twin queens of the titty committee, but you make it all back with that ass! You're just as pretty as I am, and you deserve to feel good about yourself!
Oh, that's weird. I was expecting something like you just liking pink frilly dresses as a kid or something. That sounds rough.
Oh! I was imagining you just... liked pink frilly dresses as a kid or something. A weird magic mind-wipe thing is... I'm sorry you had to deal with that.
That's the spirit! And if you still don't like it... well, I can't force you. But if I can't make you enjoy going shopping, then nobody can.
Exactly! I'm the shopping queen of the Leicester Alliance, so if you're ever going to enjoy it, it'll be with me. If it still doesn't work for you with me, it was never going to.
You're damn right. I'm going to help you look your best, and I don't care who I have to kill to do it. Once we find something that helps you see yourself the way I'm seeing you, then I'll be happy.
That's right, no way I'm letting you ignore just how good you actually look, got it? You're only going to be free of me once I show you the ~kumatora~ that I'm seeing.
...If you say so. That didn't sound like something "not important" to me, though.
...Well, you'd know better than I would. That sure didn't sound like nothing to me, though.
Oh, okay. So this guy with the pointy ears you're hunting is related to you?
Ah, okay, I get it. So the guy with the pointy ears you're looking for is actually a relative of yours?
As a younger sister, I know there's way less responsibility involved in that role. I guess I can try being the older one for a bit, though. Maybe it'll make for a fun change.
Well, I'm a younger sister, so I know there's definitely less responsibility there. I guess I can play the older sister for a bit. Maybe it'll be a fun change.
Well, I think the two of you should give it a go. Or just bang, I guess. Find something that works for you.
Well, you keep thinking it over, but I think you should go for it. Or even just have sex or something. Whatever works for the two of you.
"Energy-to-matter", huh? I'll have to ask Constance about that. That seems like her kind of weird magic. Thanks!
Perfect! I'll have to ask Constance about this "energy-to-matter" thing. I bet she's already got it all worked out. Thanks!
Oh, wow! That's incredible! I had no idea something so small could do so much!
Wow! I mean, a piece of jewelery that could do any one of those things would be amazing, but all that in one tiny thing? That's incredible!
Is this your long way of saying you're avoiding that stuff by doing something fun? Because if so, good. It sounds like you need a break.
That sounds like a lot of rationalizing and dancing around the answer. Are you avoiding work to do something fun? Because if so, good. It sounds like you need it.

This is me being sincere. You're more than just what you do for other people. Ladybug can't function without everything Marinette does behind the scenes. Just because nobody knows doesn't mean it's not important.
For the record, I would totally be up for whatever kinky super-sex stuff you get up to, but that's unrelated to this.

Don't get me wrong, you are super hot and I would totally be down for your kinky super-sex stuff, but that has nothing to do with why I'm saying this.
You deserve to know you're appreciated and loved for who you are, not just what you do. Ladybug's important, but she's nothing without Marinette's support.
I know what you mean. I mean, personally, I'm not picky, but I wasn't expecting the girls to outnumber the guys, y'know? Not that I'm complaining.
It's so weird, right? I'm not picky, so I'm just as happy surrounded by girls as guys, but I was still expecting to be in the minority, y'know?

Call it a hunch. I've talked to enough Adrestian nobles to know how they treat nations they've invaded.
Sorry, not "invaded", they like to call it "vassalling".
Well, it was just a guess. What do you use for your strip games, then?
And that worked for you? Wow. The self control that would take... Well, it's definitely more than I have, that's for sure.
Wait, seriously? You just didn't think about it? I can't imagine having that kind of self control.

Well, yeah. They're not a stand-in for an entire man, just the dick. You can use it solo if you just want to get off, but they're more fun if you get a harness and attach it to another person. It's just like any other sex toy.

Sure, it can't replace an entire human, but it's not meant to. You use it solo to relieve some tension, or you strap it to a partner and get them to do all the kissing and touching and stuff at the same time. It's just like any other sex toy.

condition.saying: I like this jacket, but I

case.state: Hey, yeah! I get using a jacket to accessorize, but never actually wearing it like an actual jacket seems like kind of a waste...
Ooh, I've seen her get like this before! This is going to get intense!
